The Two of Pentacles shows a man dancing while juggling two coins. The card shows the sign of infinity, meaning this person can handle all kinds of obstacles with no issues whatsoever. But as you look in the background, those two ships struggling on big wages underline an issue with balance.

From many points of view, the Two of Pentacles is about all the positives and negatives in life, something we all go through. But let’s take a closer look at all of the potential interpretations and how they can affect you at this moment.
Meaning of Upright Two of Pentacles

The card interpretation is fairly simple. The Two of Pentacles is mainly about balance. A small inconvenience in your balanced life can cause it to crumble, just like those coins. The more coins you have, the more careful you have to be. And this isn’t all about wealth and money.

The upright Two of Pentacles shows that you’re trying hard to keep everything in balance. This could mean you’re juggling with your romantic relationship, friends, career, money, and even health. Although juggling looks like multitasking, that’s actually contraindicated for long term success.
So far, you’ve done well, but the card may indicate a change as well.
Upright Two of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

The upright Two of Pentacles in a love reading shows that you have plenty of responsibilities in your relationship. Love is far from being a top priority, as your career and health are more important at the moment. But like everything else in life, your relationship requires a bit of effort as well.

On the other hand, if you don’t have a partner, the card asks you to be cautious. Are you ready for a new relationship? Or should you focus on other things? The Two of Pentacles advises you to sit down and make some order in your priorities. Only then you can make a decision.
Upright Two of Pentacles in Career

The meaning is similar when it comes to your career. You’re dealing with far too many things at the moment, so your job is getting a bit chaotic. You’re dealing with things that aren’t even among your main responsibilities. Maybe you’ve accepted them yourself, only to get more recognition.

Sure, you may impress those around you with your capabilities, but this is a temporary situation. It won’t last long. Don’t take on more projects, and try to prioritize what you have right now so you can get back on your feet. The idea here is to get a bit more balance in your life.
In a career reading, the upright Two of Pentacles may also tell you that you’re juggling with your career and other aspects of your personal life.
Upright Two of Pentacles in Money

In finances, the upright Two of Pentacles shows just how hard you’re working in order to keep on top of your expenses. You’re literally in a juggling act because you can’t save anything. Whatever you make goes out the window on bills and other expenses.
If anything unexpected turns up, you won’t be able to pay for it without getting into debt.

On a more positive note, the upright Two of Pentacles may also show the necessity of some major decisions in terms of money. You’re not sure where you are in life, so you have to be flexible. Despite feeling hesitant, you may have to adapt fast.
Upright Two of Pentacles in Health

In a health reading, the upright Two of Pentacles is a warning card. You’re about to lose balance, so make sure you find some stability between your work, personal life and well-being. Your lifestyle may feel a bit hectic at the moment.

Find time to eat healthy foods and stick to a proper diet. If you need some exercise, give yourself half an hour a day. You don’t need a massive change, but just a few adjustments here and there, so keep on top of your health needs.

For a pregnancy, the card isn’t necessarily a good sign. You have some issues you need to sort out first. If you try to conceive while barely balancing your life, it will cause chaos. Your stability will go down the drain, so make some room for a potential pregnancy before trying to conceive.

If you need to know about someone’s feelings, they’re on the tips of their toes right now. They have many things going on, so they struggle to find a balance. As a result, that person might feel stressed as well.
Intentions are positive though. That person is about to make you one of their priorities, regardless of all the things they have to deal with.
You’re seen as a positive omen in one’s life. Despite being busy, you’re likely to get more attention from that person.
In terms of actions, make sure you find some balance. Think about everything you have on your mind and organize your life accordingly.
Meaning of Reversed Two of Pentacles

In a reversed position, the Two of Pentacles has similar interpretations, but the situation is much more overwhelming. You can’t find balance with all the stress going on, so you actually need a break. Otherwise, you won’t be able to handle all the issues.

Give yourself some time to chill. You’re dealing with too many things at once. Too many projects at work, too many commitments in your personal life and so on. Even for money, it could mean that you have far too many expenses for what you actually make.
Reversed Two of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

In a love reading, you’ll find it hard to prioritize your love life. There are quite a few disagreements, not to mention all your tasks and demands. Your partner may also feel a bit neglected, leading to even more conflicts.

If you don’t have a partner, the card shows the necessity of making a choice. Maybe there are two potential partners out there. You’ll need to choose. Or maybe you’re too busy at work, so you don’t know if you should sacrifice a bit of work to make room for love.
Reversed Two of Pentacles in Career

The card signifies the necessity of a break in work, too. You need to stop taking on too many responsibilities. One project after another could make you look good, but you won’t be able to complete all of them, so you’ll fail in the long run.

There’s one deadline after another, causing even more pressure on you. If it’s too late, this might be the perfect time to talk to your manager and ask for some help. Learn to set priorities when it comes to work and projects, too.
Reversed Two of Pentacles in Money

If you see the Two of Pentacles reversed, you’re tight on money. Again, you’re not too good at setting priorities. Make sure your bills come first. The moment your wages come in, most of your money is gone within days only. It happens to everyone, so don’t worry, but learn to budget.

You need to create a realistic budget and even cut some of your unnecessary expenses. It might be time to get a raise, too. If you have too much spare time, don’t hesitate to look for a side project or job, only to get more money in.
Reversed Two of Pentacles in Health

Your health isn’t in the best condition at the moment. You keep pushing yourself in other aspects of life, meaning you’re neglecting your well-being. Some of these projects may also negatively affect your health, leading to more drama in the long run.

Even physically, you may end up getting injured with too many things going on. You need a bit of rest. Maybe take a few days off work and reboot. Keep in mind that with poor health, you won’t be able to do anything.
The same goes for a pregnancy. If you’re trying to conceive, make sure you work on your health first because it’s not going to happen now.
If you ask about someone’s feeling, they’re currently overwhelmed with what they go through. They’re stressed because of all the demands hitting them from all directions.
That person intends to focus on their personal problems before anything else. It’s the right thing to do, whether these problems affect their personal or professional life.
You’re not seen as a priority. Your connection is in a decent state, so they’d rather work on other things right now. Your support is extremely important in the process to find balance again.
In terms of action, you’re overextended. You can’t take on other projects or tasks, so focus on setting some priorities and taking one thing at a time.
Numerological Meaning of Two of Pentacles
The Two of Pentacles is associated with number 2. While the number indicates a good intuition and sharp instincts, the truth is it also has a negative side, which reflects emotional imbalance.
Generally speaking, you’re covered in kindness and sensitivity. Perhaps that’s why you always say yes to demands. But at the same time, too much pressure will push you into a depressive state.
As a direct consequence, mood swings may also arise when you feel pressured by deadlines or too many tasks.
Astrological Meaning of Two of Pentacles

Represented by the earth element, the Two of Pentacles is usually associated with Saturn. In ancient astrology, the planet was normally related to time. On a deeper level, the time was seen as the man’s biggest enemy.

Saturn can also be associated with material needs. However, to satisfy these needs, it’s important to find balance. That’s actually one of the drawbacks of this planet, meaning people under this association tend to struggle.
Zodiac Correspondence of the Two of Pentacles
There are a few different zodiac correspondences, but it’s most commonly associated with Capricorn.
Capricorn people are very hardworking by nature. They’re ready for action and can persevere in all kinds of conditions, even in boring and monotonous environments where nothing ever happens.
The zodiac sign also relates to material necessities and a practical approach to life. From this point of view, stability is essential.
The Two of Pentacles gets energy from such qualities, pushing you to seek balance by organizing your resources in a wise and effective manner. Discipline will push you further.
Yes or No Meaning for the Two of Pentacles

If you need a yes or no answer, the Two of Pentacles in an upright position is a yes. It shows flexibility and balance. At the moment, you’re well balanced, but you have to be cautious. Every unexpected situation can ruin everything, so it’s essential to be flexible too.
You can keep things in harmony without too much effort. You know how to prioritize, yet you should always be ready for potential challenges.

While the upright card is a yes, the reversed one goes towards no. You’re overwhelmed with stress, and that’s currently your biggest challenge. Don’t tackle the outcome, but the cause. While you can, indeed, succeed, it’s imperative to sit back for a bit and rest before going back to work.
Key Actions

When upright, the Two of Pentacles recommends seeking balance. You’re already well balanced, but remember, any issue could ruin it. Therefore, you need to prioritize even better in order to prevent potential obstacles.
From many points of view, the Two of Pentacles is a reminder to balance everything in your life. Don’t neglect any aspects of your life, or you’ll regret it later.

When reversed, the card should be seen as a warning. You have to see yourself from the outside. You’ve stretched far too much, so your tasks are nearly impossible to deal with. This means you have to reassess your needs and maybe even delegate to others.
Overall, the Two of Pentacles encourages you to stay flexible and manage your tasks efficiently to navigate challenges smoothly.

The Three of Pentacles shows someone in a cathedral, flanked by a nobleman and a priest. The card depicts discussions about the actual building. The man in the middle tries to explain something, and the others listen to him.

From many points of view, that man is an apprentice. The others are more experienced and willing to help him. They like his ideas, and they’re ready to provide guidance. What does this mean to you? Let’s go through all the hidden meanings and interpretations of the card.
Meaning of Upright Three of Pentacles

The upright Three of Pentacles represents completion. It’s about projects of any kind, whether personal or professional. Given the group in the card, these are the type of projects you’ll complete along with others rather than by yourself.

To be successful in a project, you’ll require more people’s experience and knowledge. At this moment, you have all the skills required in your group. Simply put, the whole group enjoys working together in order to reach a common goal.
The card can be seen as encouragement because your project is still in an incipient stage. However, things are going in the right direction.
Upright Three of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

In a love reading, the upright Three of Pentacles shows teamwork. It’s a good sign, especially if you’re in a relationship. You’ll notice you and your partner will work on different projects together. You’ll discover yourselves even more and come up with better plans for the future.
Such projects could be about anything. It could be a home improvement project or even the idea of buying a home together. You two are a solid team and your goals will eventually become reality.

On the other hand, if you’re single, the card is a sign that you’ll find a potential partner through teamwork. It could be one of your hobbies or something at work. As long as you work with someone else on a project, love may come your way.
Upright Three of Pentacles in Career

You’re no longer working by yourself but with a group of people. You have common goals, and you need to stick together to win. A collaboration is critical for your success. You’ll find yourself teaming up with people from other departments as well.

In a career reading, the upright Three of Pentacles also suggests hard work. Just because you team up with others, it doesn’t mean you’ll succeed. Instead, you’ll have to work for it. The greater your objective, the more work is required.
If you’re not in a job yet, the card can indicate a time of learning, so you could be gaining skills and qualifications by educating yourself.
Upright Three of Pentacles in Money

The same interpretation applies to finances. You’ll realize that working with someone will give you great benefits. Make sure it’s someone with financial experience. For example, the card could indicate a financial planner or maybe a broker for your further decisions.
Whether you need to set a budget, get some goals or make some investments, the upright Three of Pentacles is a good sign, but pay attention to who you seek help from.
Like in a career reading, the card may also indicate education in finances. You could learn about money, which will prove extremely useful overtime.
Upright Three of Pentacles in Health

If you’ve been trying to do something regarding your health, the upright Three of Pentacles shows that things are starting to move in the right direction. It could be anything. Maybe you want to lose some weight or gain some strength in the gym. It could be about a healthy diet too.

You’re determined about it, so you’ll see progress, which will motivate you to work even harder. Again, since this card is about collaboration, you may have to team up with someone to achieve your goals. Maybe you should get a friend to join you or hire a personal trainer.

Given the association with success, the upright Three of Pentacles could also show success if you’re trying to conceive. It shows fertility, and if you think about it, there are three people on the card, which represents a basic family.

If you ask about someone’s feelings, you should know they’re collaborative. They’re excited about this connection with you, and they need to see where it goes, so they’re ready to put in some effort and time.

Intentions are positive. Even if you two don’t match perfectly, that person is willing to work hard in order to make the relationship work. They know that teamwork can certainly add to the final result.
You’re seen as a good partner. You’re part of a joint relationship. That person wants to collaborate with you and work along, helping each other reach common goals.
In terms of action and what you should do, remember that collaboration is essential, so keep open to new ideas and invite others to join your project.
Meaning of Reversed Three of Pentacles

If the upright Three of Pentacles is usually a good sign, the reversed position goes in the opposite direction. It shows a problematic lack of teamwork. While working alone isn’t always bad, in this particular case, it could compromise the integrity of a project.

Sure, you could still be in a team with others, but the competition between you is too harsh. You’re not working together, but one against the other. Resources will be wasted, leading to unsuccessful results in the long run.
Your goal should be inspiring teamwork and camaraderie. Otherwise, your project will go down the drain.
Reversed Three of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

The reversed Three of Pentacles could mean more things in a love reading. For example, it could show a couple that’s struggling to work as a team. Love is there, but no one does anything about it. After all, love requires a bit of work.

The card tells you that one person puts in more work than the other. The other one takes things for granted, which won’t work. Think about how you two split chores or money, for example. Make every project a team activity, and things may improve.
Reversed Three of Pentacles in Career

In a career reading, the card shows some conflict and competition. Things won’t work well, leading to frustration. Instead of helping you, your colleagues will give you a headache. Everyone wants to be the best, but no one works together.
A constant lack of communication is one of the main causes.

If you’re not in a job yet, but seeking education, the reversed Three of Pentacles shows a lack of motivation. You’re no longer thinking about your goals. You’re not challenging yourself either, which could slow everything down.
Reversed Three of Pentacles in Money

If you’re getting a financial reading, the Three of Pentacles reversed shows your lack of interest. You’re not too bothered about learning new things. You’re not paying attention to your finances either. Looking at your finances could pinpoint some solutions, but you’re not interested.

It could be draining and may even put you off if you notice something wrong. But ignoring this problem won’t make it go away. Instead, you need to learn about financial products before starting to use them. It’s part of life.
Reversed Three of Pentacles in Health

In a health reading, the Three of Pentacles is a warning card. No matter what your goals are, you won’t see them coming any closer. The card asks you to work hard and put some effort into it, or you’ll never see any progress.

In a more negative context, if you’ve struggled with health problems lately, the card recommends taking proactive steps to get better. A simple treatment won’t work wonders if you fail to adjust your lifestyle. Whatever your doctor’s recommendations are, make sure to follow them.

The same rule applies if you’re trying to conceive. There are issues with fertility. They’re not permanent, so you could actually conceive at some point. But to do it, you need to make some adjustments, or it will never happen.

If you ask about someone’s feelings, they don’t feel like collaborating with you. Sure, there is some sort of communication, but it’s not the constructive type. Instead, you keep arguing and talking over each other.
That person doesn’t want to be near you. They don’t want to collaborate with you either because they know they’re not getting anywhere, so you may need to chill down for a bit.

You’re seen as a difficult individual. Starting a collaboration with you could be a real challenge because you don’t accept other points of view. You’re superficial in communication and that affects the potential outcome of a project.
As for what you should do, address the lack of communication and teamwork in your project.
Numerological Meaning of Three of Pentacles
The Three of Pentacles is obviously associated with the number 3.

The number has an incredibly powerful symbolism. Even when you think about childhood stories, there were always three princes, three sons, three days, you name it. Everything was in three, showing great symbolism.

Now, pretty much everything in life comes in threes. From this point of view, in traditional numerology, the card could indicate communication and creativity. In numerology, the Three of Pentacles only highlights its positive elements, including curiosity and optimism as well.
Astrological Meaning of Three of Pentacles
In astrology, the Three of Pentacles has a few different interpretations, but many of them go in the same direction and indicate Jupiter.

Jupiter is responsible for a few things, but in this particular case, it relates to a deep spiritual meaning. People ruled by Jupiter are usually honest and understanding. They’re considered trustworthy and loyal. But then, they’re not always happy with how they’re seen.
A different interpretation flows towards Mars, responsible for strategy and discipline. Such an energy will lead to successful results in the long run.
Zodiac Correspondence of the Three of Pentacles
The Three of Elements has a deep association with the element of earth. It also relates to the second decan of Capricorn.

Given this connection, people in Capricorn have an incredible motivation to succeed. Achievement and progress make them even better. They like the idea of a solid status, so they’ll work hard to achieve it.
The Three of Pentacles in this case shows a mandatory process of intense work that leads to successful results overtime.
Yes or No Meaning for the Three of Pentacles

If you’re asking a yes or no question, the Three of Pentacles is a positive yes, but with some restrictions. You can succeed if you surround yourself with others. If you go alone, the card suggests a no.
The card in an upright position shows that you can reach your goals, but only if you do it in a group of people. Otherwise, you don’t have the skills for it.

In a reversed position, the Three of Pentacles is a no. The card asks you to sit back and reflect on your behavior. Your communication is poor. Rejecting others from the project will cause you to fail, hence the negative association.
You do have the passion to succeed, but being alone makes you selfish.
Key Actions

If you see the Three of Pentacles upright, go ahead and take action. You’re already collaborating with those around you, so keep it up. Seek their knowledge and experience, and make sure you share yours as well. It’s the only way to move forward.

If you see the card reversed, you’ll have to sort out some issues first. Talk to others, communicate, ask them what’s wrong and try to make everyone understand that you’re getting nowhere without collaboration. Addressing this issue is the first step in the process.
The key takeaway is that good communication and a friendly, cooperative spirit are key to overcoming challenges and achieving success together.
Full list of pentacles cards:

The Four of Pentacles shows a man trying to hold on to four pentacles. They’re well balanced around him, with two underneath his feet. It looks like he’s trying to ensure no one can touch them. But at the same time, he needs to stay in balance, so he can’t really move.

What this tells us is that money won’t always provide freedom. However, the card may have different interpretations based on its position and reading. If you’re not sure how to read it, here are all the possible meanings.
Meaning of Upright Four of Pentacles

The Four of Pentacles can be a good card but also a bad one. For instance, it tells you that you’re doing well financially. You’ve managed to accomplish many of your personal goals, not to mention your wealth. But then, on a negative note, it tells you that you’re putting value on things based on their price.

Obviously, you’ve been through a series of challenges to get here. You clearly want this stability to stay. But in the attempt to keep winning at life, you might end up becoming a material or greedy individual. Basically, you don’t want anyone to grab some of your wealth.

You haven’t had enough money before, so this newfound wealth makes you become conservative. You’re very protective, which makes perfect sense. But at the same time, it’s important not to become a prisoner of your wealth.
Upright Four of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

In a love reading, the Four of Pentacles in an upright position tells you that your relationship is likely to suffocate you. You feel like your partner is clingy, and you try to get away from this. There is jealousy from both sides, meaning your connection will slowly deteriorate.
You and your partner may need to sit down and discuss all the potential fears related to your relationship.

On the other hand, if you don’t have a partner, the card tells you to move on. You’re currently holding onto the past. It could be the hope that your partner will come back or perhaps a grudge. Sort your mindset, and love will come your way.
Upright Four of Pentacles in Career

When it comes to your career, you might’ve struggled in the past, but the card tells you that you’ve found some stability as well. It’s new to you because you’ve had some challenges and obstacles in the past. It’s not necessarily about a big issue, but even a new job can cause distress while getting used to it.

Now that you’re stable, you’re feeling paranoid about it. You’re uneasy, and you expect things to go wrong at some point. You’re protective of everything you have, your career, ideas, projects and so on. This will make collaborations a bit difficult. Make sure you address all issues, rather than let them eat you.
In other interpretations, the card indicates a job you hate, but the paycheck is good, so you can’t leave it.
Upright Four of Pentacles in Money

In a financial reading, the upright Four of Pentacles indicates stability. You’ve managed to save a big, whether through investments or hard work. If you struggled in the past, you’re probably trying to find ways to protect your wealth now. You don’t want to end up in that position again, do you?
It makes sense, but being too conservative will make you feel stressed about it.

On a different note, if that’s not the case for you, the upright Four of Pentacles could tell you that you have a good goal. You’re saving for something big, be it a retirement fund or perhaps a new house. Whatever it is, keep doing it, you’re on the right path.
Upright Four of Pentacles in Health

In a health context, the upright Four of Pentacles defines negative energies. They’re not recent but from your past. However, they still haunt you. All these things will take their toll on your well-being. The best you can do is to get rid of them.

Meditate, get some energy or spiritual healing, you name it. Once you release the negativity, you’ll be able to see some improvement. Even opening up to friends or a professional will help, so think about all options.

When trying to conceive, the upright Four of Pentacles isn’t the best suggestion for a pregnancy. It’s just off. You’re holding onto other things at the moment. You have some negative energies in health as well, so it’s just not the right time to do it.

If you need to know more about someone’s feelings, this card shows their jealousy. They’re clingy, but they don’t necessarily like your success. They’d like to be the ones making the money, even if they’re your partner.

Their intentions are good but bad. Basically, they don’t want to lose you because you’re a valuable asset. But that’s it. It’s all material. They want you there, but for the wrong reasons, so you may have to reconsider this connection.
You’re seen the wrong way. It’s a toxic connection that keeps people close to you, even though they don’t like you 100%.
In terms of actions, make sure you retain your stability, but without being greedy or putting money first. Maybe an investment plan could do.
Meaning of Reversed Four of Pentacles

The upright position of this card isn’t the best, yet it has some positivity in it. The reversed position has a darker approach though. Instead of protecting your money and learning how to retain stability, you’re becoming greedy and aggressive. Fears take over, so you’ll do anything to protect your wealth.
This means you’re incredibly materialistic. You’ll put money above people as well.

If this isn’t you, the reversed Four of Pentacles may also indicate an issue with your spending habits. You’re wasting money, meaning your stability will slowly fade away. The card can bring in more warnings, so you have to be accountable.
It depicts a bad moment in your life, but with a huge potential to change if you do things right. Things can also aggravate if you don’t see your situation from an objective point of view.
Reversed Four of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

In a love reading, the reversed Four of Pentacles indicates the effects of insecurities from your past. These issues are healing at the moment, meaning you’ll feel better. You’ll no longer be possessive, not to mention the unreal reasons of jealousy.
In the long run, your relationship will certainly advance, but not without hard work and open communication.

If you’re not in a relationship, the reversed Four of Pentacles indicates the fact that you’re ready to explore love. Whatever you’ve been through in the past is history now. Your past emotions will no longer bother you, so you can open up again. Not before sorting these feelings out, though!
Reversed Four of Pentacles in Career
Interpretations can go in more directions when it comes to your career, so you’ll have to pay attention to your unique circumstances as well.

On a positive note, the reversed Four of Pentacles underlines your generous nature in terms of ideas, projects or other things in work. That’s an asset. You’re helping others and giving them credit. You’ll inevitably become a good leader.

On a negative note, you’re likely to make some risky choices. You don’t care much about consequences, but that could bite you overtime. For example, don’t go for the biggest project. Don’t pick the most ambitious goal at the moment. It won’t help but harm you.
Reversed Four of Pentacles in Money

You’re slowly figuring out how to open your pocket and spend a little. It’s not a bad thing, as you’re likely to help others, make some donations or even invest some. As long as you’re doing something good, it will help your soul, too.

Seeing the Four of Pentacles in a reversed position could be a reason to worry, too. Maybe you’re spending too much. Stay away from sketchy investments, shady schemes and so on. You won’t gain, but lose.
Again, like in other aspects of life, the reversed Four of Pentacles could be a card about extreme. There’s no middle option.
Reversed Four of Pentacles in Health

In a health reading, the card shows your power to recover. You’re about to get rid of all the negative energies. Whether you’ve suffered from paranoia, anxiety, anger or depression, all these things will go away, giving you clarity in financial decisions.
Even if you’ve suffered physically, you’ll be able to see some improvements in your well-being. Sure, many issues are related to feelings and emotions when you see this card.

In terms of conceiving, you’re finally getting back on track, but you need to keep working for it. Your bad energies will dissipate, and you’ll feel good. This means it’s a good time to push for a pregnancy. If there already is a pregnancy in your relationship, the card is a good sign, so it should go well.

If you ask about someone’s feelings, they’re finally ready to open up. That person was holding onto things from the past. Bad idea, but they’re ready to open up now. Your support is critical at this point.

Letting go of all the negativity also means their intentions are positive. They’re ready to talk to you and show you their inner version. Get ready for a blooming relationship, whether personal or professional. Again, it’s essential to communicate for these things to happen.
You’re seen with a good aura around you. People know that they can be honest with you without feeling judged. Therefore, they’re more likely to open up to you.
As for what you should do, simply identify that negative thing from the past you’re attached to. Analyze it and focus on overcoming this difficulty. It holds you back.
Numerological Meaning of Four of Pentacles

The Four of Pentacles is associated with the number 4. That’s usually good news because this number has a solid foundation. It’s stable and has great integrity. When you draw a card associated with it, it means you’re in the process of building a solid foundation for your future.

From a more personal point of view, the number 4 is associated with endurance and loyalty. It’s associated with elements like water, air, fire or earth, but it also underlines the four seasons of the year. In ancestry, it also refers to the feeling of home and family.
Astrological Meaning of Four of Pentacles

The Four of Pentacles is usually associated with the planet Rahu. It has more meanings, but it is mainly related to knowledge and a clever approach to life. People under this planet are energetic, and they also have a great confidence.
You’re creative and can always keep a secret.
But there’s also a slightly negative side. Your confidence may take over, causing you to fail when you get to action without doing your homework.
Zodiac Correspondence of the Four of Pentacles
Pentacles normally relate to the earth element and the Four of Pentacles makes no exception. It’s usually associated with Virgo, Taurus and Capricorn.

Most commonly relating to Capricorn, this zodiac correspondence means you’re ready to put in a lot of work over a long period of time only to ensure you meet your goals. Most of these goals are financial rather than personal.
Yes or No Meaning for the Four of Pentacles

In an upright position, the Four of Pentacles is a no. You’re in a decent position, but you guard yourself with massive walls so nothing will go through. Even if you do get an opportunity, chances are you’ll push it away rather than take it.
The reversed position indicates a yes because you’re opening new doors, getting rid of bad energies and dropping your walls a little. In other words, there’s some opportunity there.
Key Actions

When upright, the card asks you to declutter. You’re stable already, but get more stability by opening your bank account and spending wisely, whether in investments or retirement plans. Try to gain more control.
But when reversed, the card advises you to identify your bad energies or thoughts. Address them, open up about them and chances are you’ll be able to overcome them.
Full list of pentacles cards:

Like any other five in the tarot deck, the Five of Pentacles card shows adversity in one way or another. The card shows a couple of people walking through the snow. They’re rough, meaning they’re probably cold, tired and hungry. This isn’t necessarily about wealth but about other issues in life, too.

A wall in the background looks like a church or at least some sort of shelter. There’s nothing really positive about this card. However, don’t panic, as the Five of Pentacles can be interpreted in different ways. Let’s see all of its meanings and what they try to tell you in an interpretation.
Meaning of Upright Five of Pentacles

In an upright position, the Five of Pentacles signifies insecurities. It shows a hard life, which could be defined by more elements, from poverty and loss to disease and loneliness. The near future won’t bring anything good, so there’s a solid chance you’ll lose something. It could be your health as well.

One person in the card has crutches. It’s a sign of bad luck, meaning there’s not much you can do to change this problem. On the other hand, financially, the upright Five of Pentacles could also show monetary issues, such as debts or loans. From this point of view, it acts like a reminder.
No matter what the reading is about, the upright Five of Pentacles should put you in a state of alert.
Upright Five of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

If you’re single, it feels like you’re on a dead end. It feels like no one really likes you. No matter how hard you try, you’ll never be able to find a partner. You’re almost desperate, feeling like it’s time to quit and focus on something else instead. Loneliness is your new best friend.
Unfortunately, this type of attitude can cause even more drama, so it helps if you at least adjust your mindset.

If you’re already in a relationship, you’ll also feel a bit isolated. Such issues could be caused by your partner or just someone who interferes from outside. Communication is difficult, building an emotional wall between you, too.
No matter how bad it looks, you need to keep it together rather than tear it apart.
Upright Five of Pentacles in Career

In a career reading, the upright Five of Pentacles shows some sort of trouble. It’s not easy. You might feel alone in a project. Maybe you feel like everyone else is against you. In the worst-case scenario, you could even lose your job, so get ready for anything.

If you run your own business, these problems could come close to bankruptcy. It’s a downward spiral because, without training or help, you’ll keep making poor decisions. Throw in bad luck, and the situation will only get worse.
Upright Five of Pentacles in Money

The same goes for your finances. Financial hardship is part of your life if you see this card. You’ll have to stretch and go tight. You may feel cheap, but that’s the only way to go forward, as you’re spending way more than what you make.
Sometimes, the card may also indicate bankruptcy or even eviction.

No matter what you go through, it’s important to seek help because you obviously can’t handle this by yourself. Dress from charity shops if you have to. Start cooking rather than going out. Any coin in your piggy bank can make the difference now.
Upright Five of Pentacles in Health

In a health context, the upright Five of Pentacles shows health related problems. It shows some sort of disease or illness that won’t go away in the near future. Most of these problems are caused by other things in your life, so try to identify the actual causes first.

For example, if you feel anxious and depressed, it could be because of your money problems. No matter what the issue is about, focus on its root and try to fix it in order to see some improvements in other aspects.

For a pregnancy, the Five of Pentacles is a bad sign. If you’re trying to conceive, you may struggle due to infertility issues. You have problems in more aspects of life, so a pregnancy would be too much to deal with anyway.
If you want to know more about someone’s feelings, that person feels hopeless. They’re in a shade of pessimism, so they experience loneliness.
Intentions aren’t bad, but that person is ready to compromise. They accept their fate. They know they can’t overtake sadness at the moment, so they just embrace their state as it is.
People see you as someone who drains hope out of them. It’s not a good feeling, but you’re seen as a negative element in their lives.
In terms of actions, it would be wise to just accept your fate. However, do seek help from someone with more experience, such as a professional or maybe friends and family.
Meaning of Reversed Five of Pentacles

If the upright Five of Pentacles is seen as a negative card, the reversed one is usually a better sign. There’s a bit of hope coming your way. You can finally see that tiny light at the end of the tunnel. Change is definitely in the cards, and in a good way.

If you see this card reversed, it means you’ve already hit rock bottom, so you’re now going in a positive direction. It won’t happen overnight, but you’ll recover. You’ll find stability again, whether it means financially or romantically.
It’s going to be a slow recovery, but at least you’re moving forward.
Reversed Five of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

In a love reading, your sad love life is showing signs of improvement. You no longer feel desperate or rejected. Instead, your relationship is going back on track. Communication and hard work have paid off, meaning your difficult circumstances are now over.

Even if you’re single, you’ll soon notice more attention from people around you. You’ll feel more positive about your prospects. Things are slowly moving in the right direction, but then again, you need to show some patience.
Reversed Five of Pentacles in Career

If you’ve had any issues with your career or business over the past months, the reversed Five of Pentacles signifies some improvement. Things are getting better. It’s a slow process, but things will most likely get back to normal.

No matter how difficult these situations may seem, the truth is you’ll see an upgrade. This could mean many things. Your current job improvement could improve, or you’ll find a new job as well. Keep an eye out for opportunities.
Reversed Five of Pentacles in Money

You’ll notice your finances improving as well. You’ve struggled with money lately, but no matter what financial loss you’ve been through, it’s over now. You’ll end up with a better budget, mainly because of proper financial planning.

Maybe you’ll sort some debt out, or you’ll manage to rebuild your savings account. It’s an ongoing effort. Just because you see some improvement, it doesn’t mean you have to stop. Financial stability takes time to build.
Reversed Five of Pentacles in Health

The same kind of idea applies in a health context. You’ve had some issues with your well-being, while the reversed card shows improvement and a better response to the treatment. Even if you won’t see a change straight away, the fact that you’re under treatment and this will give you a well-deserved peace of mind.
Like in other types of readings, the reversed Five of Pentacles is a positive card to draw in health, too. No matter what treatment you’re under, stick to it.
The card signifies some improvement if you’re trying to get fit, too. Maybe you’ve gained a few pounds lately. It’s time to shed them now.

When it comes to pregnancy, the reversed Five of Pentacles shows you that things could get better. Your fertility issues are slowly reaching an end. Whatever you’re doing, stick to it because it shows positive results, so you can try to conceive again.

If you need to know more about someone’s feelings, the card shows that the time of darkness is ending now. That person feels better as depression fades away and may feel optimistic and energetic again soon.
Intentions are positive, too. That person is ready to come out of their shell and deepen their connection with you. Give them time and stay positive about it.
You’re seen as a source of light. People feel positive in their connections with you. They’re ready to open up, and you’re the best partner for that.
In terms of action, harness your powers and chase optimism because you’ll find your inner strength again.
Numerological Meaning of Five of Pentacles

The Five of Pentacles is associated with the number 5. The good news about this number is it usually brings good luck in life. People represented by this number have clear thinking and can make excellent decisions, but they’re also good at making plans.

Your communication is brilliant. You’re also the type who loves a bit of adventure every now and then. Your personality is dynamic, and that helps in life. Of course, like everyone else in life, they have ups and downs as well.
Astrological Meaning of Five of Pentacles

The Five of Pentacles has a few different astrological associations. For example, it’s often associated with Mercury. In this relation, it grabs qualities like trickery and triumph. Treachery is another element to consider, especially when used as a solution to desolation.

But then, the Five of Pentacles can also be ruled by Venus, which is known for its feminine energy. In this interpretation, people always search for stability. They like their comfort zone, and they find comfort and peace in consistency, so they prefer routines.
Zodiac Correspondence of the Five of Pentacles

The Five of Pentacles has a strong association with the element of earth. It also relates to the first decan of Taurus. Given the more common association with Mercury, people in this sign have a sharp mind and extraordinary intellect.

This could also be a double edged sword. They tend to worry a lot about things that will never happen. But at the same time, their reason and logic are flawless, so they’ll easily find solutions before problems arise.
Yes or No Meaning for the Five of Pentacles
In a yes or no question, the Five of Pentacles may suggest a different answer based on its position.

If you draw this card in an upright position, it shows a no. It’s about struggle and loss. You’re not in the best possible position in life. Therefore, major decisions will often be ruled by emotions, so they won’t be the best. If you have something big in mind, leave it for later, as you risk failing.

In a reversed position, the Five of Pentacles is a yes, but a cautious one. You’ve already been through the worst. Things are getting better, but they’re far from normal. You can clearly see some light, so you have to keep fighting. Get into action and keep going.
Key Actions

The action you should take also depends on the position of the card. Draw it upright, and you’ll need to find some support. Don’t be afraid to ask for help, whether it comes from friends, family or a professional. You’re struggling at the moment, so find assistance to help you overcome this situation.

If you see the card reversed, change your mindset. Things are getting better, and your suffering is over. Arm yourself with confidence and optimism and get to action. You may have to work harder than normally, but at least the situation looks much better.
In short, Five of Pentacles reminds you that while hardships are inevitable, they are also an opportunity for transformation and healing, leading to a brighter and more stable future.
Full list of pentacles cards:

Depicting a man wearing the color of wealth, purple, the Six of Pentacles is often associated with wealth. It shows him giving money to two beggars. He has a scale on his hand, which suggests that what goes around comes around. It’s about being fair and accepting karma, as it may hit you out of nowhere.

From many points of view, this card is about cause and effect, rather than money. It has a great deal of symbolism in all the small bits in its representation. But anyway, let’s see what it could actually mean for you based on its interpretation.
Meaning of Upright Six of Pentacles

In an upright position, the Six of Pentacles shows a good connection with your money. Everything you have is in balance. Some money goes in, less money goes out, you’re always positive. There’s no stress in your life and you’re more than happy to share what you have with others.

You weren’t born in wealth, though. The card shows when you’ve actually struggled to get what you have. At this point, it might be a good idea to start giving some of it away. However, while connected to money, the card interpretation isn’t always financial. You could also give time away, as well as good vibes.
Upright Six of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

In a love reading, the Six of Pentacles shows love, harmony and kindness. Your relationship is great at the moment. You and your partner support each other and have common goals, regardless of their nature.

You may find yourself focusing a bit too much on external things, such as work or perhaps a new business venture. It’s not a bad thing, so don’t feel guilty about it. You’ll be happy to find out that your partner is supportive and up for it.
On the other hand, if you’re single, you’ll find that your generosity (or someone else’s dedication) will most likely lead to a relationship in the long run.
Upright Six of Pentacles in Career

The upright Six of Pentacles is a good sign for your career as well. Seeing this card means that someone with a higher position or authority is ready to help you out and push you from behind. In this case, reaching your career goals becomes a matter of time only.
You’ll receive both energy and time.
If this isn’t the case, the card indicates a positive working environment. Everyone’s happy with your contribution and people value your ideas and solutions.
If you’re after changing your career or perhaps your job, the card symbolizes a great amount of success. The outcome will be even better than you imagined.
Upright Six of Pentacles in Money

From a financial point of view, generosity is all around you. If you’ve always dreamed of starting a business, this could be the best moment because those around you are willing to help out with their time, money or expertise.

Money won’t come your way out of nowhere. You’ll have to work for it. You’ll need to go out there, tell people about your idea and seek support. You’re very passionate about it, so you’ll manage to inspire those around you.
However, apart from all these, the card could also indicate that you’re in the position to help others.
Upright Six of Pentacles in Health

In a health reading, the upright Six of Pentacles shows success. Your well-being is through the roof. Your health will dramatically improve. Most commonly, the card shows up after you’ve dealt with some sort of an illness. With others’ support, you’ll be back on your feet in no time.

At the same time, the card indicates great success if you’re about to do something major. Thinking about a new diet? Interested in losing some weight? Gain muscle? Gym journey? No matter what this is about, you’re likely to succeed.

For a pregnancy, that’s definitely a good sign. If you’re trying to conceive, this is a great time to do it. And if there already is a pregnancy in your relationship, there should be no complications whatsoever.
If you need to know about someone’s feelings, that person feels supportive. They also feel supported by you, so it’s a solid connection with good grounds.
Their intentions are extremely positive. No matter what you’re planning to do in the future, they’ll be there by your side to support you.
They see you as a pillar. They know they can rely on you, and they try to offer the same feeling in exchange, so you’re in good hands.
As for what you should do, offer help if you’re asked for it. And if you’re not, ask for it, as you may need it instead.
Meaning of Reversed Six of Pentacles

The upright Six of Pentacles shows some type of charitable work going either way. It could be to your benefit, or maybe you help others. In the reversed position, it tells you that charity will only be one way.

If you’ve helped someone, don’t expect any help back. If you’ve given money to someone, you may not be able to see it again. In other words, the reversed card is mostly about caution. If you’re not fully stable, helping others could become an issue for you.

The reversed Six of Pentacles may also warn you about all your debt. You do have a problem, but it can be solved if you seek help. On the other hand, if you continue with poor choices, chances are you’ll end up in bankruptcy.
Reversed Six of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

In a love and relationship reading, the reversed Six of Pentacles signifies an imbalance, which will clearly cause some issues in the long run. One person is giving a lot, while the other person is happy receiving without giving anything back.

This kind of attitude will become frustrating for the giving partner at some point. It feels like one of you is taking advantage of the other. Therefore, it’s critical to avoid being dependent and this rule doesn’t apply to you only.
If you’re single, the card warns about partners who may get you into this type of imbalance. Don’t be too generous straight away, and try not to depend on others.
Reversed Six of Pentacles in Career

For your career, the reversed Six of Pentacles is a warning. There’s someone around your workplace who seems nice to you. They feel generous as well, but that’s because they have a hidden interest in you. They’ll gain your trust, and they’ll hit you when least expected.

Generally speaking, try to avoid getting favors from others, even if they’re offered. Don’t depend on anyone. You can, however, get a bit of help, but don’t abuse it because you might be held responsible for it.
The issue may also affect you. If you’re being nice to someone just because their position benefits you, this type of behavior is more obvious than you imagine, so stay away from this temptation.
Reversed Six of Pentacles in Money

In a financial reading, don’t get your hopes up for help. If you need financial support, there won’t be too many people around willing to help you. And if you do find someone, make sure you’re careful about it because you may end up owing back too much.

If you find yourself in a good situation and you can give money away, resentment could kick in. Be careful and keep being real. Financial discomfort is normal when you see someone taking advantage of you, hence the necessity of caution.
Reversed Six of Pentacles in Health

In a health reading, the card asks you to seek help before it’s too late. You’re not in the best position. Your well-being isn’t looked after. The more you overlook it, the more problems you’ll get in the long run, so there’s no need to delay it.

There is some kind of support available, but you also have to be open about it. Ignoring it could cause disagreements with medical professionals around you. Plus, things won’t improve by themselves, so your problem will aggravate.

You’re not doing well in health, meaning a pregnancy shouldn’t be among your plans right now. If you’re trying to conceive, there’s very little chance to succeed. And if you do succeed, there might be some complications later on.

Curious about someone’s feelings? That person feels some imbalance in your connection. They feel like they give too much and you don’t. However, it could be the other way around too, so they may feel guilty.
Given the lack of balance, they intend to step out of this relationship, whether it’s a romantic or professional one. They don’t want to be involved, so they may start looking elsewhere.
You’re not seen as a balanced person, so your behavior affects the relationship, hence the plans to step out.
Seek balance. That’s the best thing you can do right now, whether it’s from your side or the other side.
Numerological Meaning of Six of Pentacles
Represented by the number 6, the Six of Pentacles also relates to harmony and a natural flow in life. Communication is essential for you.
Based on the above representations, it doesn’t mean that everything’s right in your life. Instead, it means you have a desire for balance, which you may have to work for.

With the number 6, your fate is at play. You have good fortune overall. You may have a happy home as well. And if you don’t, a little work will make all these happen. Focus on the present, as it will help you build your future later on.
Astrological Meaning of Six of Pentacles
Like every other card in the tarot deck, the Six of Pentacles may have a few different associations in terms of astrology.
Most commonly, this card is associated with the Moon. The Moon has more meanings, one of them relates to an overall sense of security, whether in finances or love life.
The constant movement of the moon reflects how life balances, in and out of stability.
Zodiac Correspondence of the Six of Pentacles

The Six of Pentacles is associated with the second decan of Taurus. Taurus is an earth element. It’s usually ruled by Venus, but with serious influences from the Moon. The sign revolves around material comfort, so financial stability is often a priority for people in this zodiac sign.

This person is also conservative, but committed to work and succeed too. This doesn’t mean they’ll compromise on pleasure or beauty. Instead, they like to be stubborn sometimes, especially when it comes to luxury in their lives.
Yes or No Meaning for the Six of Pentacles

Drawing the Six of Pentacles upright in a yes or no reading is a yes. The universe is kind to you right now, so you’ll find support in any decision. Obviously, a little planning is required, not to mention some work later on. But overall, the universe will give back.

In a reversed position, the same card indicates a no. You’re not very stable in life at the moment, as there are some imbalances. It might be wiser to sit down and sort these issues out before making any major decisions.
Key Actions

If you see the card upright, go for it. Action is required to make things happen. You have what it takes. Don’t be afraid to ask for support if you need it, and don’t hesitate to offer it if you’re asked for help. There is plenty of strength in both giving and receiving.
When reversed, try to find balance in your life. Otherwise, you’ll fail in most of your ventures. If you’re pushing yourself too much, it might be time to relax a little.
In the end, The Six of Pentacles highlights how important it is to balance giving and receiving. It encourages you to be generous but also to take care of yourself to keep things in harmony.

The Seven of Pentacles depicts a man who worked hard in order to achieve success and is now taking a break to enjoy the blossoms of his work. There are seven pentacles hanging from the bushes, which he admires. He looks tired and while it looks tempting, he’s not picking his harvest up just yet.

The concept behind this card is fairly simple to understand. He thinks about long term success. He picks one pentacle, but he lets the others there, hoping they’ll get even better. Let’s find out what this kind of interpretation actually means for you.
Meaning of Upright Seven of Pentacles

The upright Seven of Pentacles is about work, effort and investment. If you worked hard lately, the card shows that you’re seeing some progress. You’re successful, but you want to take this venture even further by letting your investments grow overtime.
Such investments aren’t necessarily about money. Sure, the card could be interpreted financially as well, but such an investment can be made romantically as well.
Given the fact that such investments are left to grow also shows the fear of failing. You’re not sure whether or not you should reap these rewards.
Upright Seven of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

In a love reading, the upright Seven of Pentacles shows that your relationship can and will flourish, but it’s a slow growth. Life with your partner may look a bit tedious. You should focus on long term success, maybe even make some compromises.
The card is also a reminder that things can be good or bad rather than always positive. Also, it’s not all about romantic feelings but also about other aspects of your lives.
If you’re single, the card tells you that a good friendship may also become a romantic relationship. The people you meet now are more likely to become romantically involved with you later on.
Upright Seven of Pentacles in Career

There’s definitely some progress in your career. Sometimes, it’s obvious that things are changing for the better. Other times, you may not be able to see the progress, yet it’s there. Even if it’s slow, hard work will eventually pay off.

Since life is a bit slow at the moment, it could be a good idea to look at what you’re doing and perhaps make some changes based on what works and what doesn’t. It’s the best way to understand where to put more energy.
If you run a business, analyzing your craft could be useful, as you’ll be able to build a solid foundation for the future.
Upright Seven of Pentacles in Money

From a financial point of view, the Seven of Pentacles shows you that you’re about to get some rewards. They won’t come out of nowhere, though. These are the results of your hard work, whether it comes to your career, investments or just budgeting.

Progress seems to be more obvious financially. Keep doing what you’re doing, and you’ll soon be able to reap the rewards. Obviously, once you get some money, you’ll have to spend wisely, rather than go back where you started.
Upright Seven of Pentacles in Health

The upright Seven of Pentacles is a good sign in a health reading as well. If you’re trying to change something (such as your diet or your fitness journey), the card indicates a good time to start. Evaluate your goals and make adjustments accordingly. You’ll most likely succeed.

The Seven of Pentacles is also seen as a card of manifesting goals. Even if you don’t have any goals at the moment, set some. You can do anything right now, break bad habits or start new habits. Your health is likely to skyrocket in no time.

If you’re trying to conceive, the upright Seven of Pentacles could be associated with a pregnancy as well. The card can also be associated with nurturing activities as well as growth. Therefore, the pregnancy is likely to be successful.

If you’re curious about someone’s feelings, the card tells you that they’re confident in your connection. That person is ready to put in some effort and they know you’ll do the same for them, meaning long term success is a matter of time only.
That person believes in this connection, so intentions are positive. They’re ready to dedicate themselves 100%. Intentions are determined and very strong.
You’re seen as a piece of security in someone’s life. You bring peace and happiness, hence the attraction towards your character.
As for what you should do, a bit of reflection is mandatory. Pause, as you have all the time in the world. Assess your circumstances and maybe make some changes before moving on.
Meaning of Reversed Seven of Pentacles

In a reversed position, the Seven of Pentacles shows that your rewards may not be that great. They’re scattered all over the place. If you have some expectations, results are usually far from them. The good news is you’ll know something’s wrong, so you’ll be able to make some adjustments.

Maybe you should stop investing energy into a particular project. Maybe you should stop pouring money into a business idea. Sit back and reevaluate your resources against your results. Again, this applies to both money and love.
Reversed Seven of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

In a love reading, the reversed Seven of Pentacles tells you that your efforts bring no rewards. You probably feel it already since you’re ready to give up on everything. You’re putting a lot of effort in, but you don’t see things changing. Love won’t just appear out of nowhere like magic.

Even if there is some progress, any love reading showing the Seven of Pentacles (in any position) indicates something slow. Even if there is some progress, and it may lead somewhere, it doesn’t mean you’ll see it. Sometimes, you just have to keep going.
Reversed Seven of Pentacles in Career

In a career reading, the card tells you that you put way too much effort into work or you simply don’t do it enough. It shows a lack of stability. There’s no balance whatsoever. No matter what you do or try, nothing seems to change. Results are like nothing.
But then, if you see it from a different direction, overworking isn’t always the most productive thing. Imagine your career as a plant. Overwatering will kill it and the same rule applies to you.
If this isn’t the case, the card could also indicate that you’re not working hard enough for something. It’s not always about the volume of work. Your priorities could also be wrong.
Reversed Seven of Pentacles in Money

In a financial reading, the Seven of Pentacles reversed shows failing investments. No matter what you put your money in, they won’t give you the rewards you’re expecting. And this isn’t all about money, but also about time.
Worst case scenario, you’ll lose everything. Best case scenario, the progress will be insignificant. Chances are you’ll be somewhere in the middle, so you’ll suffer some losses.
No matter how hard you work for these financial goals, when you see this card, it shows that you won’t be rewarded accordingly, so it might be wiser to leave them for now.
Reversed Seven of Pentacles in Health

When it comes to health, you’ve had some issues lately. Most of them were caused by yourself, rather than the universe. You’re less likely to have an accident. Instead, your bad habits could have caused these problems.

The best thing you can do is adjust your lifestyle. You need to push for recovery. Sit back, analyze your habits and determine which ones are hurting you. Making a few adjustments will get you back on track, no worries.

If you’re trying to conceive, the reversed Seven of Pentacles isn’t always a bad sign. Normally, you should look at other cards in the spread as well. Generally, the card tells you to look after yourself before trying to conceive, and things will get better.

In terms of someone’s feelings, the reversed Seven of Pentacles shows frustration. That person is exhausted and won’t resist like this for too long, meaning they’re ready to give up on your connection.

Their intentions aren’t the best, but they don’t do things because they want to. That person wants this connection to grow, but the past failures have convinced them to give up. They can’t see any results, hence the quitter attitude.

They feel good about you generally. You have many qualities and look like the perfect partner, but there’s something there that doesn’t feel right. Something’s clearly off. It’s not always about who you are, but also about that person’s perception and expectations.
As for what you should do, think twice before moving on. Since you can’t see progress, you might be doing something wrong, hence the necessity of some adjustments in your life.
Many times, it’s better to just call it a day. You should no longer push for something in particular. Things could get better if you stop and let those things come to you naturally.
Numerological Meaning of Seven of Pentacles
This is one of the main elements in numerology for the Seven of Pentacles, which is obviously associated with the number 7.
Traditional numerology suggests sitting back, rather than pursuing things. Hard work is, indeed, useful in life, but pushing too much becomes counterproductive.

Compared to other cards, anything represented by the number 7 is a bit difficult to interpret because you need to work for something, but it’s not advised to pursue it. There’s a very fine line between doing it right and overdoing it.
Astrological Meaning of Seven of Pentacles
The Seven of Pentacles is an element of Earth. While it has a few different associations, most interpretations relate it to Venus.
The energy comes from two different directions here.
First, Venus is a bit feminine. This planet is about beauty, but also about attraction. It could also symbolize abundance and not necessarily in terms of money.
On the other hand, since this is an earth card, it shows a material approach to life. But at the same time, it also indicates nurturing. The card asks for abundance but in a stable manner.
The Seven of Pentacles grabs all these energies at the same time.
Zodiac Correspondence of the Seven of Pentacles

Again, earth signs could go in a few directions, yet most interpretations of the Seven of Pentacles head towards the Taurus zodiac sign. In this particular case, the zodiac sign and astrological meaning go hand in hand.

This means people in Taurus are seen as materialistic, but they also have a nurturing nature. They work hard for what they have, but at the same time, it feels like they’re always seeking some sort of stability or balance.
Yes or No Meaning for the Seven of Pentacles
In an upright position, the card is a yes. Despite not seeing much effort, the card recommends going further. Stick to what you’re doing, things will get much better in the future.

On the other hand, in a reversed position, it’s a no. It indicates frustration. It also tells you that you’re tired, so you’re thinking of giving up. However, patience is extremely important in the future. If you’re willing to keep working, you may succeed, but take it easy and step back a little.
Key Actions

In an upright position, the Seven of Pentacles asks you to reflect on your life and what you’re doing. If you’re not happy with the results, change the plan. Something obviously needs some adjustment.
If you see it reversed, make sure you force yourself to be patient while making these adjustments. You’ve run out of patience, which is perfectly normal, but rushing won’t take you anywhere.
In conclusion, the Seven of Pentacles reminds you to plan wisely, be patient and be ready to adjust when needed, leading you to stability and success.
