The Eight of Pentacles reveals a man etching pentacle shapes into gold coins. It shows someone who’s fully immersed into work. He’s well concentrated on the job. Meanwhile, there’s a town in the background, meaning he’s far from all the action, only to focus better on his work.

This card usually shows when you prioritize something over everything else in life, only to succeed at the respective task. It has more interpretations, of course, so let’s go through all the possible meanings of the Eight of Pentacles.
Meaning of Upright Eight of Pentacles

In an upright position, the card indicates hard work and a strong focus. You’re focusing on nothing but one particular task. It’s not necessarily a bad thing, as you try your best to come up with a good result. It makes no difference if this task is personal or professional. It could be love, health or your career.

At times, this task might feel a bit overwhelming. Despite your hard work, you don’t have to be afraid to seek help if you feel like it. At the end of the day, this card is all about your efforts. You take a lot of effort to do things by the book, but you also need a balanced approach in life.
Upright Eight of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

In a love reading, the upright Eight of Pentacles tells you that maintaining a relationship requires skill and hard work. You need patience, curiosity and compassion, among many other things. It’s the only way to improve your connection. You’re learning some things as well.

You’ll also find out that your lover can still surprise you in a positive way, even if you’ve been together for ages. If you look good enough, you’ll discover something different all the time. It might be surprising at times, but you have to take the time to appreciate all these discoveries. After all, it’s just who they are.
Upright Eight of Pentacles in Career

In terms of career, the upright Eight of Pentacles is a good sign. You’ve been fully committed to your work or projects. This means you’ll see some rewards soon. If you have any long-term goals, this might be a good time to see them become a reality.

Those around you also appreciate your dedication, so they’ll see you as a leading figure. In some cases, the card may relate to your promotion. Even if you’re thinking of starting a business, it’s a good sign. You have the skills to succeed; you just need to put in the work.
Upright Eight of Pentacles in Money

Financially, the upright Eight of Pentacles is just as good. You’ve been fully dedicated to your projects, so financial rewards won’t hesitate to show up. It could be a promotion, a bonus, more business if you run a company or perhaps a new position that will bring in more money.

The idea here is to keep your focus. Despite finding money, you have to be careful. Reckless spending can take you back to your first steps. In the long run, your dedication will help you gain financial independence.
Find motivation at the beginning of your venture. Think about how hard it used to be when you started. All this progress is a good sign that will push you further.
Upright Eight of Pentacles in Health

In a well-being context, the upright Eight of Pentacles refers to your effort to recover after an injury or illness. It can also indicate your effort to get into a gym routine, get fit, lose some weight or perhaps adopt a healthy diet. Any of these things refer to your overall health.

You’re at a time in life when your health is extremely important. You couldn’t have gone so far without a top-notch discipline. You’ll feel healthier than ever before, but let that be your motivation. Just because you’re succeeding, it doesn’t mean you have to stop.

If you’ve tried conceiving, there’s a higher chance to succeed now. Normally, the Eight of Pentacles isn’t about a pregnancy, but if you’re trying for it, it’s usually a good sign. It does require a bit of extra work, hence the lack of association.
If you ask about someone’s feelings, that person is dedicated and ready to show you their feelings. They like who you are and they’re ready to make things work.
Their intentions are hard. Even if the relationship is not great, that person will try to make it work no matter what. A bit of compromise and some work from your side will help as well.
You’re seen as a hardworking individual. You have good morals, and you seem dedicated. These are just some of the reasons wherefore people are attracted to you.
As for action, it’s time to hone your capabilities and push yourself. You’re very close to success, you just need to take the last few steps.
Meaning of Reversed Eight of Pentacles

Interpretations are quite similar for the Eight of Pentacles, whether upright or reversed. However, there’s a catch. No matter what the task is about, the reversed position shows more demanding work. You’ll have to work harder in order to be successful.

What you’ve done so far is good, but you need to harness your powers and push harder. It makes no difference if your reading is about love, relationships, career, money or health. Either way, if you don’t push yourself, you’ll start navigating back to where you started.
Reversed Eight of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

There are no shortcuts in love and relationships or at least that’s what the Eight of Pentacles tells you in a reversed position. It may work as a reminder. Basically, you need to put in some effort to make things work. If you take things for granted, your relationship is very likely to die, rather sooner than later.

At this moment in life, your relationships need a lot from you. Maybe your partner needs something, or perhaps you’re doing something wrong. Are you showing enough affection? Are you paying attention to your daily chores? Analyze your relationship and see what could go wrong.
Reversed Eight of Pentacles in Career

In a career reading, the reversed Eight of Pentacles tells you that you hate your career or at least your job. You’re stuck in a place that you truly hate. You have no motivation whatsoever. Your enthusiasm is gone as well, meaning your results will suffer.
On top of all these, you don’t feel like doing anything to change the situation either.

If you’re not in a job, but you’re actively searching, the card tells you that you may struggle. Employers don’t find you suitable for their available positions either. Even running your own business could bring in some problems, especially in terms of quality. Your reputation is at risk.
Reversed Eight of Pentacles in Money

Even dealing with money requires hard work. Just because you have a decent paycheck, it doesn’t mean you can spend left and right. Budgeting and organizing your money requires skill, work and experience. While you may have skills and experience, you don’t feel like putting the work in.

Ignoring this issue will cause drama in the long run. You’ll soon realize that you spend more than you make. To deal with such issues, it’s better to react while you can still change something rather than wait until the last moment. It might be too late, then.
Reversed Eight of Pentacles in Health
In a health reading, the card can go in two different directions. To figure out the right one, you’ll need to be honest with yourself and assess your situation.

The card could tell you that you focus too much on your health. This means you overlook other things. For instance, you may want to lose some weight, so you starve yourself, which will obviously ruin your health.
The other direction is about neglecting everything in terms of health. You have a horrible diet, no exercise and maybe even abuse some substances.
No matter what the situation is, try to find balance in your life.

For a pregnancy, the reversed Eight of Pentacles isn’t a good sign. You’re not doing well right now, so the card may indicate some fertility issues, too. While you can definitely try, it might be wiser to get back in shape first.
When you ask about someone’s feelings, the card shows fatigue. That person is tired of trying everything, with no success. They’re about to quit on you.
Although they normally have good intentions, they feel like they’re not getting anywhere. That’s the reason wherefore they’re ready to step out of this relationship.

You’re seen as a skilled and dedicated individual, but you don’t always get the rewards you deserve. You get frustrated with it and even become lazy. The bad news is people are more likely to see this side of you.
In terms of action, try to see the bigger picture. You focus in the wrong direction, so maybe reassess your work as well.
Numerological Meaning of Eight of Pentacles

Associated with the number 8, the Eight of Pentacles represents the achiever. You’re a person who measures success based on goals. You have a good sense for work, and you’re not afraid to dig. Your presence is definitely powerful, not to mention your drive.

If you look at number 8, you can also see symmetry. This means you’re a balanced individual. When everything feels stable, you’re in control. You also benefit from others’ support, which makes you even better. It’s the perfect environment for someone represented by this number.
Astrological Meaning of Eight of Pentacles

The Eight of Pentacles is strongly related to the Sun. It’s a card represented by the earth element, so it grabs energies from both directions. You’re very good at setting long term objectives. You pay attention to every small detail, and you can find a solution to any problem.

On top of all these, you’re always ready to put some work in. Your rhythm doesn’t pose too many challenges because you like a fast paced environment. You feel comfortable when under pressure, which makes you very productive.
Zodiac Correspondence of the Eight of Pentacles

The Eight of Pentacles is strongly related to the Virgo zodiac sign. It’s the first decan of the sign. If you think about ancient interpretations, the sign relates to women responsible for keeping sacred flames alight.

From some points of view, things haven’t changed much. For instance, the Virgo is dedicated to sacred and large principles. Such people are ready to make things work, even if it takes a great deal of effort. They can successfully handle labor intensive jobs and even repetitive and boring tasks.
Yes or No Meaning for the Eight of Pentacles

In an upright position, the Eight of Pentacles is a yes. It’s a yes about determination and hard work, since you’re ready to show everyone what you’re made of. Whether it’s love, work or your health status, you’re ready to set some goals and turn them into reality.

In a reversed position, the card is a warning. You’ve worked too much, so you’re close to burnout. This means it’s a no. Take a break instead, reassess yourself, gather your strengths and start again later on.
Key Actions

If you’re not sure what to do, just follow your goals. Focus on small objectives that lead to a major goal. Put the work in. Concentrate and go for perfection. You may not reach it, but you’ll be close enough.
On the other hand, the reversed position asks you to see things more objectively. Don’t focus on one small thing until you become unproductive, but pay attention to other aspects of your life, too.
In short, the Eight of Pentacles teaches that true success comes from consistent effort and balance. It encourages you to embrace your hard work, know your limits, and seek support when needed.

The Nine of Pentacles shows a woman surrounded by coins in a vineyard. She has a beautiful dress enhanced with flowers. It’s an image of wealth, especially if you look at the castle in the background as well. A falcon rests on her left arm too.

The vineyard indicates wealth, especially since they’re full of grapes, not to mention the coins. But what does that mean for you? Let’s see all the possible interpretations of this card in different positions and types of reading.
Meaning of Upright Nine of Pentacles

In an upright position, the Nine of Pentacles tells you that you’re full of confidence. You’ve reached a good position in life. You’re independent from all points of view. You weren’t lucky, though, but you’ve made it with hard work and dedication. You’re finally ready to enjoy the rewards now.

All the difficulties and issues from your past are gone. The Nine of Pentacles doesn’t symbolize the joy of life and success only, but also the freedom associated with material wealth. You can finally celebrate what you’ve been through and accept life with its good elements.
But like other nines in the deck, the Nine of Pentacles could also indicate that your life isn’t perfect yet. You’re right before the completion of a cycle, so you feel like you miss something.
Upright Nine of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

In a love reading, the Nine of Pentacles shows you that life is great. You’re covered in luxury, as it also applies to love and relationships. Simply put, you have everything you can think of. You’ll also love to see that both you and your partner are stable and full of achievements.
Your lives are good, as well as your hobbies, passions and careers, not to mention your social life.

On the other hand, if you’re single, romance won’t feel like a priority. You’re more likely to focus on what you’ve managed to achieve and live life as it is. This kind of attitude will inevitably make you attractive to those around you.
Upright Nine of Pentacles in Career

You’re just as successful when it comes to your career. You’ve achieved quite a lot over the past years, while rewards are just as exciting. You’re in the right position, you’re successful and the financial aspect is just as good.
You have a professional attitude and you work very hard, hence all the success. You can now sit back for a while and enjoy it. If you run your own business, it’s probably flourishing.
If you’re close to retirement, the upright Nine of Pentacles may also indicate the idea of retirement, but it also symbolizes a vacation after a time of intense work.
Upright Nine of Pentacles in Money

Prosperity is the main keyword in a financial reading as well. When you see the upright Nine of Pentacles, you know that financial security won’t be an issue too soon. It’s not all about your job, career or how hard you’ve worked lately.
In a financial reading, the card may also indicate a successful investment.
Given this material confidence and balance, you’ll realize that your social status will clearly improve too. You’re more visible, as you go out more often to celebrate your success.
The Nine of Pentacles is often tied to land as well, so seeing it could indicate the potential to purchase property in the near future.
Upright Nine of Pentacles in Health

When it comes to health, the upright Nine of Pentacles indicates a fit and healthy individual. If you haven’t bothered much about your health, you’re just lucky. But chances are you’ve worked for this achievement as well. You’ve been trying to improve your lifestyle, start a gym journey or maybe change your diet.

Even if you’ve had an injury or an accident, working on your improvement has rushed the healing process. Keep putting some work in and things will get even better. No matter how fit you are, you need to maintain your well-being too.

If you’re trying to conceive, the Nine of Pentacles is a good sign. You’re successful in everything, mainly due to work. You must’ve worked hard in this field, too. Therefore, a pregnancy could be there at any moment.

If you ask about someone’s feelings, that person feels secure. They have no worries whatsoever, but that’s because they have no reason to be stressed either. They feel like they have everything they require to be happy.
Intentions are positive too. If you see this card, it means that person intends to feel thankful for all the success.
You’re seen as a hardworking person. You’ve accomplished everything with work and dedication, so you’re a role model for those around you.
In terms of action, focus on happiness. Enjoy sufficiency and care, but also celebrate your success with your loved ones.
Meaning of Reversed Nine of Pentacles

If the upright Nine of Pentacles is all about success and celebration, the reversed position goes in a slightly different direction. It could actually indicate some sort of suffering and discomfort, mainly caused by material instability and insecurity.

Seeing the card reversed tells you that you’re trying to keep up appearances, but that will ruin you in the long run because you’re not financially fit to do it. This is a time in your life when you’ll see that money doesn’t always buy happiness. Material wealth isn’t everything.
Obviously, other cards in the spread could also affect the interpretation.
Reversed Nine of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

It may look like your life is perfect, but the truth is something’s not right. In a love and relationship reading, the reversed Nine of Pentacles shows that you don’t feel 100% confident in your relationship. You love your partner, but you feel guarded. You just don’t feel like putting those walls down.

If you’re single, you can probably tell that something’s missing. Your career is good, money is right, everything works, but you don’t have someone to share your success with. Usually, it’s because you don’t let people come closer. You do it unconsciously, so opening up may require a bit of work from your side.
Reversed Nine of Pentacles in Career

For your career, you need to look at what has happened lately. If you’ve had many problems, chances are they were caused by your lack of implication. The reversed Nine of Pentacles shows that you do want to be successful. You do want to get up there, but you’re just not ready for all the work associated with it.

The interpretation may go in a different direction too. If you’ve worked too hard lately, you’ve probably overlooked everything else. Time flies by and while being hardworking is important, you may have to review other aspects of your life too.
Reversed Nine of Pentacles in Money

Even if your situation looks alright financially, the truth is you’re overspending at the moment. You don’t look at money, and you never check your bank account. You just spend recklessly, many times, on things you don’t even need. All these things are caused by your impulse.
Seeing the reversed Nine of Pentacles means you may end up regretting all these expenses.

On the other hand, the card could also show that you depend on someone else financially. Even if it looks like there’s nothing to worry about now, you still have to be cautious. Furthermore, stay away from shady investments, get-rich schemes and things like that.
Reversed Nine of Pentacles in Health

The reversed Nine of Pentacles isn’t a good sign for your health, either. You have no control over your health. Discipline isn’t there either. You have no clue how to keep a diet, not to mention the lack of physical activity.

If you’ve actually had some health related issues, think about what might have caused them. You should adjust your lifestyle and adopt a healthier approach. Your fitness could actually help you avoid these problems.

If you’re trying to conceive, the reversed Nine of Pentacles is one of the last cards you want to see. It could indicate the end of a pregnancy, such as a miscarriage, so make sure you attend all tests and appointments. If you’re still pushing for a pregnancy, fertility issues could prevent it at the moment.
If you ask about someone’s feelings, they know they have everything, but they feel incomplete. They may also feel fearful about opening up.
Intentions aren’t bad, but the card shows some sort of fear. That person is scared about the connection with you, mainly because it could compromise their financial independence.
You’re seen as someone who tries too hard. You live beyond your means. You’re trying to keep up appearances, and people see it, so don’t bother.
Reassess your situation and focus on maintaining your stability. You’re alright at the moment, but you’re going in the wrong direction, hence the necessity to make some adjustments.
Numerological Meaning of Nine of Pentacles

Associated with the number 9, the Nine of Pentacles shows more things. You’re close to the end of a cycle, so you’re still in transition. Since your cycle is almost over, you’re more likely to enjoy some sort of success. However, you also have to be ready for the next chapter.

In numerology, the number 9 is mainly about learning, discovering, applying new lessons and enjoying success later on. You’re a mature individual, but only because of your personal growth. You’re also mature enough to know what you want from life.
Astrological Meaning of Nine of Pentacles
The Nine of Pentacles is associated with the element of earth. It’s also connected to Mercury.

The planet has more astrological interpretations, depending on the zodiac association, too. In this particular case, it’s a planet of power and creativity. It’s also a planet of manifestation. While setting goals is easy, working for them is just as important.
The most common association between Mercury and the Nine of Pentacles covers the zodiac sign Virgo.
Zodiac Correspondence of the Nine of Pentacles

The earth association with the Nine of Pentacles suggests three different zodiac signs, Virgo, Taurus and Capricorn. Like the Taurus and Capricorn, the Virgo is also known to work hard and to actually love the process.

The Virgo association goes even further because this zodiac sign tends to be dutiful. Such people love to help others, so they’re always of service. While materially powerful, the Virgo could also be emotional at times.
Yes or No Meaning for the Nine of Pentacles
The yes or no interpretation of the Nine of Pentacles depends on its position.

If you’re asking such a question and you see it upright, the card indicates a yes. It’s a yes about celebrating your success and enjoying what you’ve worked for. You deserve everything you have at the moment. No matter what plan you have in mind, go for it because you’ll succeed.

The card becomes a no if you see it reversed though. You’re going too far. You’re spending too much. You’re more concerned about appearances, so you can’t enjoy yourself. It’s not a good time to do something.
Key Actions

As for what you have to do, the upright position advises you to live life. Self-sufficiency should be a priority at the moment, but you also need to look after yourself. Enjoy the rewards. Be proud of yourself and surround yourself with friends and family.

When reversed, the card tells you that you depend too much on someone or something. You need to reassess your independence and find ways to regain it. Stop relying on everyone else around you for support. Find ways to establish your freedom, and things will naturally improve.
When reversed, the card asks for quick action, as it’s a warning.
Full list of pentacles cards:

At first glance, the Ten of Pentacles shows love and wealth. The card depicts an old man surrounded by family and pets in the middle of an archway. As you look through the archway, you can see a beautiful estate. His robe has motifs of grapevines.

In theory, there’s nothing to worry about when you see this card. There’s nothing bad in it. From a more practical point of view, it could have different interpretations. Let’s see all of its meanings in order to figure out which one is more representative of your circumstances.
Meaning of Upright Ten of Pentacles

The Ten of Pentacles shows an overall level of satisfaction. You have a family, and you’re wealthy. It shows that your hard work has finally paid off. Even if you’re not already there, a bit of extra work will get you in the right position in no time. Your legacy will definitely last.

From many points of view, this card is a relief. You’ve struggled in the past, but it was worth it. Looking at the man’s peace when surrounded by family, it feels like you’re happy only because of all the seeds of happiness you’ve planted in the past.
The symbolism of the Ten of Pentacles is rooted in financial stability, love, and health. It also advises making the right decisions further on.
Upright Ten of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

In a love reading, the card shows abundance in your relationship. You’re in the best position. You love, and you’re loved, but you’re also financially stable. Nothing seems to break your aura of positivity. Furthermore, the card also indicates the beginning of something new.
If you’ve lived separately, you two can move in together now.

If you’re single, the card isn’t as positive. It means that your family has a very strong influence over who your partner is. Sure, your family is important, and you want them to get along with your partner. They don’t have bad intentions, but they want the best for your life.
Upright Ten of Pentacles in Career

The Ten of Pentacles shows a group. In other words, it’s more suitable for those who run a business or are thinking of starting one. It could be a family business as well. Either way, you’re likely to succeed if you choose to go down that path.

But even if you work somewhere else, the card means that your job is ideal. Your career is going in the right direction. It’s secure and likely to provide security and stability for yourself and your family. You’re working in a good environment, a company with an impressive history.
Upright Ten of Pentacles in Money

Financially, the upright Ten of Pentacles indicates wealth. This could mean more things. For example, you might be expecting some sort of inheritance or perhaps a donation. Whether it’s just money or a business partnership, it’s likely to come from someone who you’re related to.

The card may also indicate your path to gaining financial independence. You’re building the foundation of a good future. You could be writing a retirement plan. You could be building some savings too. In general, you’re on the right path and you won’t fail.
Upright Ten of Pentacles in Health

In a health reading, the upright Ten of Pentacles underlines stability as well. This means your health is on track. You’re physically fit but also emotionally stable. Your fitness journey shows progress, while your thoughts and feelings are in the best possible place.

If you’ve struggled lately with your health, the card shows improvement. Most likely, it will come from friends and family. At the same time, it might be a good idea to check the family history for potential affections, especially if you don’t feel very well.

For a pregnancy, a card that depicts a family and wealth is excellent. If you’re trying to conceive, this is the perfect time to do it. If there already is a pregnancy in your relationship, it should go well, with no unexpected problems.
Need to know more about someone’s feelings? Good news! That person sees a future with you, so they feel confident that things will work out in the long run.

Their intentions are extremely good because they’re captivated by your personality. They’ll try to discover more of you, so don’t see it as an intruding behavior. It’s all because of how they feel about you.
That person sees you as someone who’s accomplished. This could mean you’re also financially stable, which is a plus.
In terms of actions, focus on your long term success. Seek stability, no matter what you do, but also try to find balance in every aspect of your life.
Meaning of Reversed Ten of Pentacles

In a reversed position, the Ten of Pentacles could go in the opposite direction. It may act like a warning. Sure, things are good now, but failing to pay attention to your life could lead to an issue. Most of these problems tend to be financial, but your love life could also suffer.

If you don’t change something about your habits, this change could be pretty sudden. There is already some damage there, but other positive things in your life compensate for it. This means you may not be able to see it. Overlook this problem, and it will aggravate.
At some point, it might be too late to do something about it.
Reversed Ten of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

When looking for love, there’s a solid chance you’ll look out of your circle. Your family and friends may not necessarily approve of your new partner, and you’ll put that above the emotional connection between you two. You may also see some conflicts between your lover and those around you.

Some will find your partner unsuitable. Even if that person has a good job and your connection is great, the different background could be an issue. Your family also needs to show off to their friends. All these things will have an impact on your relationship.
Reversed Ten of Pentacles in Career

In a career reading, the reversed Ten of Pentacles shows instability. Your current job isn’t too stable and may not have a future. It could be about your career as well. From this point of view, it might be wiser to look in a different direction. Just keep looking, you never know.

The same goes if you run a business. No matter how hard you try, you’re less likely to succeed. Your business will slowly fade away. It could be a big debt, but it could also be bankruptcy. You might be able to save a few things.
The general idea here is to know when to cut your losses.
Reversed Ten of Pentacles in Money

In a reversed position, the Ten of Pentacles is just as bad. It shows that there’s some debt there. Ignoring it will make it get worse, as different debts will add up. You’ll need to make some changes in how you spend or how you optimize your budget.

If this doesn’t apply to you and you have no debt, the reversed Ten of Pentacles may also indicate some issues with your family. It could be an argument about money or maybe some disagreement regarding an inheritance. Just be extra careful and try to budget your money accordingly.
Reversed Ten of Pentacles in Health

When it comes to your health, you could be doing good or bad at the moment. The card acts as a warning sign. Some change will occur out of nowhere, and it won’t be a good one. It could be an illness or perhaps a random injury.

If you already suffer from a condition, the association with the family may indicate that it’s genetic. That’s why it’s important to get in touch with a specialist doctor and find out what happened. Your family history is just as important in the process.

For a pregnancy, that’s clearly a bad sign. If you see the card reversed, don’t try to conceive. There could be some infertility problems, too. If there already is a pregnancy in your relationship, it could be affected by a negative outcome.
When you ask about someone’s feelings, you’re not seen as a long term prospect. That person likes you, but they expect your family to be against you two.
From this point of view, that person will question the connection. Is it worth it? Is it worth the hassle? Their intentions are fueled by concerns.
You’re seen as someone who can’t find stability at the moment. That person sees you as a potential problem, as you may have issues with money, your family or both.
When it comes to action, address every issue that may arise. Make sure you find out what causes the instability and focus on solving the problem.
Numerological Meaning of Ten of Pentacles

The Ten of Pentacles is associated with the number 10. This is the end of a cycle, but also the beginning of another one. It’s a number that symbolizes renewal, meaning you’re supposed to begin another chapter in life.

You’ve gone through other chapters before, and you’ve learned something from all these challenges. You’ve attained some new skills as well. This means you can use all these lessons to succeed in the new cycle.
The number 10 can also be associated with number 1, which clearly indicates new opportunities.
Astrological Meaning of Ten of Pentacles
Like other pentacles, the Ten of Pentacles relates to the element of earth. It can be associated with a few zodiac signs, but it’s ruled by Mercury.
From this point of view, the planet relates to travel, commerce and intelligence. It has a good energy in communication as well. Mercury addresses how you think about things and how you react.
Mercury relates to Hermes, a god who can cross borders that others can’t reach.
Zodiac Correspondence of the Ten of Pentacles

Despite being associated with a few other zodiac signs, the Ten of Pentacles usually relates to Virgo. People under this zodiac sign are focused on refinement. They always seek perfection, no matter what they do. They seek perfection in love, health and money.
The Ten of Pentacles is seen as the bigger picture here. Every single goal is part of a bigger vision.
Furthermore, the Virgo sign is also seen as a modest and highly focused professional. Such people love working in teams and always look for success, no matter what they get involved with.
Yes or No Meaning for the Ten of Pentacles

If you ask a yes or no question, the upright Ten of Pentacles is a yes. The card represents success in every form. Prosperity, family, wealth, stability, you name it. All these things are part of your aura. No matter what you have in mind, this positive aura will help you succeed.

When reversed, the card is a no. It’s a warning sign that you try to find validation in everything you do. This behavior may push you forward, but it’s not a positive attitude. In the long run, you have to do things for yourself, rather than for others’ appreciation.
Key Actions

When upright, the Ten of Pentacles tells you that you’re stable and successful. But you don’t have to stop here. You still have to seek stability. It’s an ongoing project. Make some changes if you can, and don’t hesitate to act. Everything you do at this point should be successful. Just make plans for the long term.
The reverse position advises you to reanalyze your goals and achievements. If something looks fishy, address it. Anything that could cause instability must be assessed before you move on.

In the end, the Ten of Pentacles teaches us that true wealth isn’t just about money—it’s also about love and family. Think about your own journey, celebrate what you’ve achieved, and keep making smart choices to keep your success going strong.
Full list of pentacles cards:

The Page of Pentacles shows a young person in the middle of a field. You can see a few lush trees in the background. The facial expression doesn’t show any concerns at all, yet the youth looks unaware of what’s around. All the attention is focused on a coin.

That coin could be wealth or security, but it could also represent ambition and sensuality. The card shows a grounded person, but its interpretations may vary. Let’s take a look at all of their meanings and what they actually mean to you based on their position in a spread.
Meaning of Upright Page of Pentacles

When drawn in an upright position, the Page of Pentacles shows focus and ambition. This person benefits from some sort of protection. Guided by this universal advice, they are tied to nature. They cherish what’s around them, while their ambition leads to further plans for the future.

When you meet this card, you meet everything related to your material matters. As for the message sent by this card, it’s mainly about the idea of following your ambition. The card indicates good energy and the type of dedication that will help you succeed, even if you have to be repetitive.
Upright Page of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

The upright Page of Pentacles shows ambition and loyalty. This person is practical and may hide some mysteries, but once discovered, they’re well appreciated. They are dedicated to both their personal goals and their love life.

If this doesn’t sound like someone you’ve just met, it could be about your current relationship or maybe even yourself. Even if your relationship may seem a bit dull at times, there are no doubts about love. It’s there, but you two also have to focus on other aspects of life.
However, a bit of excitement every now and then wouldn’t hurt.
Upright Page of Pentacles in Career

For your career, this card represents a new foundation to become successful. You’re currently building the base of something great. You have goals and new strategies in mind. You’re not afraid of work either, so you just need to pick the right opportunity and go for it.

Things won’t just happen out of nowhere. You’ll have to spot these opportunities and actually work for results. For example, it could be an educational program to change your specialization, or maybe you should consider getting a different job.
Whatever it is, this is a good time to go for it.
Upright Page of Pentacles in Money

The upright Page of Pentacles represents good news in terms of money. You’re likely to get some financial rewards, but you need to make some steps in that direction. It could be anything, so you need to keep an eye on every possible option.

For example, you need to research your options. Budget accordingly, put some money aside, maybe consider an investment and so on. All these things combined will push you in the right direction and can change your current material state.
Upright Page of Pentacles in Health

In a health context, the upright card shows good health. You’ve never felt better in your life. No matter how old you are, you feel young again. This is a great time to start your fitness journey or maybe start a new diet, whatever suits you. Obviously, you have to put some effort into it, but you’ll succeed.

Keep in mind that all the pentacles relate to the element of earth. This means you might as well consider a naturist approach. Reconnecting with nature could also help reach your objectives. For example, take some walks or hiking trips.

If you’re trying to conceive, the upright Page of Pentacles is a good sign for your fertility as well. Again, your health is mint at the moment. Even if there is a pregnancy in your relationship, the card shows great success.
If you have to know more about someone’s feelings, the card shows loyalty and dedication. That person is deeply involved in your relationship, which could only lead to good things.
Intentions are positive, too. There’s always room for improvement, so that person will try to deepen this connection even further, showing great interest in you.
You’re seen as an ambitious person who can set realistic goals and go for them. That’s one of the things that draw people towards you.
In terms of action, make sure you approach each situation the right way. Open up your mind and enjoy learning new things.
Meaning of Reversed Page of Pentacles

When it shows up in a reversed position, the Page of Pentacles shows that you can’t concentrate. There are plenty of distractions around you, so there’s no focus whatsoever. The best thing to do is learn how to focus your mind on certain priorities before moving on.

The Page of Tentacles also shows the need for a reset. Perhaps that’s why you can’t focus. Take a break from everything, recharge yourself and get back to work with a better attitude. You may also feel overwhelmed, hence the necessity of a break.
Reversed Page of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

In a love reading, the reversed Page of Pentacles shows there’s no passion in your relationship. This also means that you’ve lost your dedication. Your commitment is on the go as well. Every new person popping up in your life is a reason to feel distracted from your current relationship.

If you’re single, all these potential partners popping up could be a reason of distraction. You don’t really know what you want, so maybe set some priorities. At the same time, failing to set clear goals will confuse them as well. You’ll never find real love this way.
Reversed Page of Pentacles in Career

Bad news will also affect your career. You’re too distracted to pay attention to your studies or workplace. While you may have some goals in mind, the steps to get there are quite shaky. Sooner or later, you’ll trip and fall.

No matter how great your objectives are, you feel lazy about it. You’ve lost your motivation too. Sometimes, these issues are caused by your unrealistic expectations. You can envision the final result, but you miss all the work needed to reach it.
Reversed Page of Pentacles in Money

The Page of Pentacles in a reversed position is a sign that you’re struggling financially. Even if you’re doing alright now, such issues may arise later on. Some sort of financial instability is also part of the game. At some point, you’ll end up feeling worried about every expense.

The card may also show nothing but a lack of responsibility with money. At this point, it’s fairly simple to fix the issue. Just start budgeting and stop spending recklessly. You could also start a savings account, only for emergencies and unexpected situations.
Reversed Page of Pentacles in Health

In a health context, the reversed Page of Pentacles indicates poor choices. Your lifestyle is pretty unhealthy and unless you make some changes, you’ll experience even more suffering. Even if you’ve tried to change your diet or exercise, the card tells you that you need to put more effort in.
Procrastination is your best friend at the moment, but it won’t help overtime.

At the same time, the reversed Page of Pentacles could indicate the fact that your goals are way too ambitious. In fact, they’re unrealistic. You’re not seeing any progress whatsoever. Instead, break them down into smaller goals, which are easier to achieve.

For a pregnancy, the card indicates more difficulties. Conceiving will be a real challenge. And even if you do manage to conceive, that pregnancy will face some complications later on, so it’s not a good time to try.
If your question is about someone’s feelings, the card indicates a lack of commitment. That person can be easily distracted, meaning they’ll drift away from their long term goals.
That person has good intentions and would like to focus on long term results. However, they find it impossible with all the distractions around them.
They don’t see you very well. In fact, you’re seen as someone who doesn’t use common sense in what they do.
As for what you should do, try to find more meaning in your actions. Reassess both your actions and goals and make some adjustments.
Numerological Meaning of Page of Pentacles
The Page of Pentacles is usually associated with the number 11, which means two different interpretations.

When relating to number 11, it means your path in life will face more obstacles than most people around you. However, this means you’ll sharpen some of your skills. You’ll get a better instinct, but you’ll also develop inspiration in a creative manner.
These gifts are natural, but they need honing.
Your emotional intelligence is nearly perfect, however, your dreaming sensitivity means you’re very easy to hurt.
The other interpretation breaks 11 into the number 2. This number is associated with duality and balance, but again, you have to work to find them.
Astrological Meaning of Page of Pentacles

The Page of Pentacles is associated with the element of earth. It’s also related to the astrological combinations of Venus. At this point, you’re always determined to use your creativity for long term success.
However, the card may also relate to Mercury, which means you’re meticulous in what you do and you love small details.
Another association is with Saturn, which determines your ambition to never give up.
From all these relations, the Page of Pentacles is most commonly connected to Venus and its feminine energy.
Zodiac Correspondence of the Page of Pentacles

Each planet association recommends a different zodiac sign. Venus relates to Taurus. Mercury refers to Virgo, while Saturn relates to Capricorn. However, since Venus is the most popular association, the card is mainly linked to the Taurus zodiac sign.

This sign shows comfort and stability. You love your material belongings, and you tend to seek coziness in your environment, whether it’s your home or workplace. You love indulging yourself, too, especially when it comes to a nice treat.

Although you’re known for your trustworthiness, you’re also a stubborn individual. When someone challenges you, you’ll feel comfortable defending your point of view in a passionate manner. Simply put, your determination makes you an incredible opponent in any sort of disagreement.
Yes or No Meaning for the Page of Pentacles

In a yes or no reading, the Page of Pentacles in an upright position is a yes. It recommends going for it. Take that leap. Join that adventure. You have what it takes to succeed. Your deep consistency and hard work are your best traits, so they’ll help you make wise decisions in the long run.
Your instincts won’t disappoint you either.

In a reversed position, the card is a no. You can’t find your motivation at the moment because your life is boring. You think about making a big decision, but you’re very likely to make a bad one. You’ll end up in regret later. Just give yourself a bit of time to think about everything and decide later.
Key Actions

The best thing to do when you see the upright Page of Pentacles is to dive straight in. You need an open mind, but you also have to be curious about discovering new things. You won’t go wrong, but you’ll learn new skills to help out later in life.
The card aims to push you to explore and discover new things.

You may have to stop if you see it reversed, especially if you’re about to make a decision. There are more things that fog your mind and prevent you from focusing on what’s right. Sit back and analyze your position before making major choices.

Overall, thinking about the Page of Pentacles can help us understand the importance of balancing our ambitions with staying grounded. Whether you’re working toward a goal or need to take a break, this card reminds you to stay mindful and balanced.
Full list of pentacles cards:

The Knight of Pentacles underlines effort and work, but also a sense of responsibility. Sitting on a dark horse, the knight looks at the fields. While other knights in the tarot deck underline the need for adventure, this one is different. Instead, the knight prepares for the harvest.

This depiction defines long term plans and future considerations. The knight is thinking about the kingdom, just like you’re probably thinking about your home and family. All in all, let’s find out what this card is trying to tell you when drawn in a spread.
Meaning of Upright Knight of Pentacles

The upright Knight of Pentacles represents all the responsibilities associated with certain aspects of life, as well as different projects. The knight is peaceful and calm, but also patient enough to understand that completing projects shows commitment and brings long term success.

If you see this card, you need to know that you’re a reliable person. But at the same time, it tells you that your assignments require commitment. Generally speaking, you always do your best to succeed. At times, you might feel like a perfectionist as well.
From a different point of view, the Knight of Pentacles may also represent your daily tasks and activities, as well as routine.
Upright Knight of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

In a love reading, the card tells you that you’re diligent, reliable and patient. However, there are times when you might overlook your relationship. You don’t like risk, so it’s nearly impossible for someone else to convince you to change things in life.
While you can be stubborn, you’re also trustworthy.

Your relationship is deep and stable. You like security, so seeing the upright Knight of Pentacles is usually a good sign. It also shows that your partner is willing to put in just as much effort to make this relationship work.
Upright Knight of Pentacles in Career

For your career, the upright Knight of Pentacles shows a deep level of dedication and drive. You know your goals very well, so you’ll do anything to get there. Even if your goals are set for months or years, it makes no difference, you’re still committed to the routine and hard work to get there.
You’re not the fastest worker in the world, but you’re consistent and that’s more important.

If you’re not in a job right now, but you’re looking to kickstart your career, the card tells you to prove yourself. You must show you’re dedicated to a specific job, but you also need to define your reliability and show it off. It’s the only way to impress a potential employer.
Upright Knight of Pentacles in Money

Your financial stability has always been a plan. You have a future that requires work. Again, you’re steady in your progress, and you’re not rushing, only to avoid making mistakes. You have some tested strategies that work, so there’s no rush at all.

You don’t like big risks, despite the potential earnings they may bring in. Instead, you prefer reliability and safety. While you’re always budgeting and taking things slowly, don’t forget to look after your own needs either, as you need to reward yourself every now and then when you reach small goals.
Upright Knight of Pentacles in Health

In a health context, the upright Knight of Pentacles shows that you’ve been suffering lately. You might’ve had an injury or perhaps an illness. Don’t worry about it, you’ll feel your energy building up now. You’re recovering, and while the process could be slow, you’ll see some progress.

Recovering after an injury will make you even stronger. The card also acts as a warning sign. You need to understand what being healthy means. Adjust your diet, exercise on a regular basis and make sure you sleep enough.
The Knight of Pentacles is not really associated with a pregnancy. However, if there is a pregnancy in your relationship, you’ll do all the right things to make it easy and successful.

If you ask about someone’s feelings, the upright Knight of Pentacles tells you that they’re serious about your connection. They have patience, and they want to do everything by reading the book. That means they can be stubborn but for a good cause.

In terms of intentions, that person may understand that you’re not ready for them or you have other things to focus on at the moment. Therefore, they’ll be patient and wait until you’re 100% ready to make a commitment.
You’re seen as a reliable individual. You won’t rush, and people know that, so they give you the time you need to process things.
As for actions, the card advises you to adopt a steady approach in life. Take it easy, analyze each situation and create a plan.
Meaning of Reversed Knight of Pentacles

In a reversed position, the Knight of Pentacles tells you that all your natural traits are now pushed too far. If they’re good in the upright position, they’re a bit extreme when the card is reversed. For example, you no longer embrace routine but feel bored with it. You’ll also lose your motivation.

The reversed Knight of Pentacles may also tell you that you focus too much on certain things but ignore other important aspects of life. You don’t always have both love and money, but one or the other, depending on what you focus on.
Simply put, you end up sacrificing yourself with all the responsibilities you have, so you’ll end up making poor decisions in the long run.
Reversed Knight of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

In a love and relationship reading, the reversed Knight of Pentacles shows that your love life is a bit boring at the moment. You also enjoy spending time with yourself, so you don’t really fancy the idea of emotional risks. After all, there’s a chance you’ll get rejected as well.

Things aren’t great if you’re in a relationship either. Life is dull, so you may feel like a change could improve it. The reasons vary widely. It could be work or perhaps just a lack of priorities in life. Make sure you and your partner find time to spend together if you want this relationship to last.
Reversed Knight of Pentacles in Career

The reversed Knight of Pentacles isn’t a great sign for your career, either. Think about it for a minute. You have no ambition left in you. There’s no motivation, and you hate your time at work. There are more reasons, but one of them could be the lack of work.
Without work, your career goals will never become reality.

On a different note, the card may also indicate an extreme dedication. You push yourself too hard for your career goals, so you sacrifice many other things in the process. You don’t go out anymore, your friends are gone, and you haven’t had a deep conversation with your partner in ages.
Basically, you risk facing burnout if you don’t look after yourself and have a bit of fun.
Reversed Knight of Pentacles in Money

In a financial context, the reversed Knight of Pentacles defines a poor attitude towards resources. You’re wasting money. You spend it on things you don’t really need. You’re impulsive, and you usually regret your choices later on. You could obviously find a better use for money.

Ignoring this behavior will make it aggravate. In the long run, you’ll spend much more than what you earn, so your problems will aggravate. Instead, try to budget and be more careful about things. If you want something, give yourself another week or so, see if you still want it later.
Reversed Knight of Pentacles in Health
If you’re getting a health reading, seeing this card reversed defines an extreme situation. It’s either one or the other. There’s no balance or stability in your health whatsoever.
One interpretation defines laziness and procrastination. You don’t go to the gym, you eat bad food, and you know your health is deteriorating, yet you don’t do anything about it.
The other interpretations define your obsession. You’re obsessed with what you eat or what you do in the gym. You do it religiously, sacrificing other aspects of life.

No matter which one you are, you’ll have to find a middle option. If you feel lazy, take your dog for a walk, take a five mile walk in a field or go run a few miles on a treadmill. If you’re pushing yourself too hard, take a break. Relax or treat yourself to a pizza. You haven’t had one in ages, have you?
For a pregnancy, the reversed Knight of Pentacles isn’t necessarily a good thing. Since you’re too extreme, it might be better to wait until you find a bit of balance in your life and try later.
If you need to know more about someone’s feelings, the card tells you they’re a bit bored. They love you, but they miss the passion. A bit of spontaneity may help.
Intentions are positive. That person may look for new ideas to try out, whether it’s a holiday, days out or just something more romantic and intimate.
You’re not seen as the most responsible person in the world right now, but that person knows that deep down inside you, you’re a good person.
In terms of action, try to look at yourself from the outside. Are you trying too hard or too little? The idea here is to find a balance between love, work and health.
Numerological Meaning of Knight of Pentacles

The Knight of Pentacles relates to the number 12. This number refers to cosmic order. It’s a matter of growth, but it also defines spiritual evolution. When you see this card, it means everything will work in your favor, but it’s up to you to take some action.

Without the drive, you’ll fail. But if you’re willing to put the work in, you’ll succeed. It’s also a number that showcases progression. Think about the zodiac signs, months in a year, numbers on a clock and so on.
From a different point of view, the number 12 could also be seen as number 3 if you add its two digits. In this case, the number shows growth, but only through consistent collaboration.
Astrological Meaning of Knight of Pentacles

The Knight of Pentacles relates to the element of earth. However, like other knights in the tarot deck, it could also be influenced by fire. This combination of energies is associated with the planet Mercury, which has a fiery influence.

The knight is focused on results. You won’t get involved in things that make no sense. Everything needs to have a purpose. You won’t join a ridiculous adventure just for the sake of it. Instead, you use your resources by the book.
Zodiac Correspondence of the Knight of Pentacles

Earth signs normally relate to three zodiac signs, Taurus, Virgo and Capricorn. The Knight of Pentacles is most commonly associated with Virgo. You’re an independent person, but also self-sufficient. You find dedication in everything you do.

Given the association with the element of earth, you’re also an analytical person. You love the present, despite having long term goals. At the same time, you work hard and you keep a quiet profile. The spotlight isn’t your favorite thing.
Yes or No Meaning for the Knight of Pentacles
When upright, the Knight of Pentacles is a yes. You’re mature enough to go for what you want, so the universe is telling you that you have everything you need to succeed.
Even when reversed, the card is still a yes, but a different one. Yes, you need a change because life gets boring, so yes, you can go for it.
Key Actions
When upright, the Knight of Pentacles advises you to keep steady. You’re disciplined, but you also have to be consistent and follow a strict plan to succeed.
If you see the card reversed, consistency can become boring. This means you need to make a change. You’re determined, but this trait prevents you from progressing, so change something.

The Queen of Pentacles shows a woman on a throne. She holds a coin, but she’s also surrounded by beautiful flowers and trees. The nature motif goes even further because her throne is enriched with animal carvings.

From some points of view, this card shows success, peace and good energy. However, its interpretations could also go in the opposite direction. Let’s find out what this means for you based on its position and type of reading.
Meaning of Upright Queen of Pentacles

In an upright position, the Queen of Pentacles shows a woman who plays any role you can think of only to keep those around her happy. If you’re this person, you know how to show love, how to provide support and how to take care of people.

While it looks like a family card, the truth is these qualities and traits are just as prolific in business or career. You know what it takes to execute a plan by the book. You have a natural talent for business. You prefer to keep things private and straightforward, too.
The interpretation isn’t always about you but also about someone in your life who can guide you accordingly.
Upright Queen of Pentacles in Love & Relationships
In love, you’re warm and generous. You have a practical approach to life, and you’re a hardworking person. You love being at home, whether with your partner or with a few friends.

In a relationship, the card indicates a solid and stable relationship. It’s prosperous, meaning you two succeed in every aspect of life. Your life together is flawless, so you can always treat yourselves and celebrate this form of success.

If you’re single, the card asks you to find someone who brings value to your life. Your standards are pretty high, and you should keep them like this. Find someone who shares the same level of ambition and dedication.
Upright Queen of Pentacles in Career

In terms of career, the upright Queen of Pentacles is a good sign because it shows high levels of success. You’re very organized in your project, and you can create a very effective plan to make your goals a reality. It’s the same rule if you work for a company or you run your own business.

If this isn’t necessarily about you, it could be about a successful person in your workplace. Feel free to collaborate with this person because you’ll learn, develop new skills and find the guidance you need. If you’re given advice, make sure you take it very seriously because that person won’t disappoint you.
Upright Queen of Pentacles in Money

Financially, the upright Queen of Pentacles shows success. You have plenty of everything you need. Material security is there, so there’s literally nothing to be concerned about. You already know that working hard for a while will make you feel comfortable financially, so you can get some rewards.

The card relates to someone who’s responsible with money and can find a perfect balance in terms of income, expenses, treats and taste. You know what a good deal looks like, but you won’t settle for cheap garbage.
Upright Queen of Pentacles in Health

Seeing this card in a health reading means you’re doing things right. You’re in very good physical and emotional condition at the moment. You eat the right foods, you get plenty of rest, and you exercise as often as you can.

If you’ve suffered from an illness lately, the card is an advisory element. It basically tells you to pay attention to how you felt, what lifestyle issues caused the illness and how you can prevent it in the future.
Pay attention to what and how you eat as well, then make some adjustments to improve your condition.

The Queen of Pentacles is also associated with fertility. If you’re trying to conceive, this is the perfect time to do it. Go for it, and you’ll be successful. If you’re already expecting a baby, the card indicates a successful one with no complications or issues.

Curious about someone’s feelings? Seeing this card means that the person is extremely supportive. That person takes your needs very seriously and will make sure you’re well taken care of. Get ready to experience plenty of support and love.
Their intentions are extremely positive. You’ll be given valuable advice that can help with your goals, but you’ll also find all the support you need to be successful.
You’re seen as someone who needs this support. People want to help out. They’re aware of your necessities and will work harder to keep you happy.
As for action, make sure you take care of every aspect of your life. Pay attention to your health, consider your finances, get more involved with your partner and so on.
Meaning of Reversed Queen of Pentacles

When reversed, the Queen of Pentacles is disconnected from all the positive traits and energies in the upright position. Instead of focusing on helping others and offering support, the queen becomes a selfish individual. Every focus becomes a negative issue.

The reversed Queen of Pentacles may also indicate the fact that you’re terrible at setting priorities. You’re focusing on the wrong things, which will eventually ruin your future. You’re always distracted, and despite having good intentions, you refuse help.

On a less negative note, the card may also tell you that the people you’ve looked after are now ready to be responsible. Therefore, you have to learn how to let go and provide some form of independence to those around you.
Reversed Queen of Pentacles in Love & Relationships

In a love reading, the reversed Queen of Pentacles refers to a shallow individual. They’re insecure, so they tend to be possessive. This issue will affect their love life. They focus on objects rather than finding a deeper connection.
If you’re in a relationship, don’t treat your partner like an object. Instead, look after their needs and expectations as well.

On the other hand, if you’re single, you should take some time off and figure out your own insecurities before connecting to someone. Basically, you’re likely to get involved in a relationship for the wrong reason.
Reversed Queen of Pentacles in Career

Your working environment isn’t the most stable one. You feel like you work in a chaotic place. Your career has big ups and downs, so your income varies widely. You do have skills and capabilities, so feel free to get to work and get your hands dirty. It’s the best way to move forward.

If this question is about someone in particular, it could refer to a colleague or partner who procrastinates. Such people tend to cause a lot of trouble in the long run, so it’s imperative to be cautious about it.
In some situations, the card may also relate to someone who dislikes you for the position you have. They want your place, so they can try attacking you in different ways, such as gossip.
Reversed Queen of Pentacles in Money

Seeing the reversed Queen of Pentacles is a bad sign if you’re asking about money, too. You’re not very good at handling money at the moment. You spend too much, you buy random stuff, you give everyone money and so on. You’re not doing well, and sooner or later, you’ll be forced to put yourself first.

From a different point of view, the card could also relate to a deeply materialistic time of your life. You’re a bit shallow, so you simply try to get your hands on everything. Stop hoarding things you don’t need. Saving every coin will eventually make you feel miserable, so you need to treat yourself at times.
Reversed Queen of Pentacles in Health

The Queen of Pentacles shows issues when you see it reversed in a health reading. Many times, these issues are associated with weight. You’re likely to be overweight, but you can also be underweight. A poor state of health is also indicated.

You have too many responsibilities. Even if you don’t see it, you’re overwhelmed, so you tend to forget about basic things, such as looking after yourself. Improve your sleep hours, walk or exercise and try to eat some healthy foods.
You may want to look after others first, but you wouldn’t be able to do it without healing yourself.

Given the health issues, the card also indicates a bad time to conceive. If you’re trying to start or enlarge a family, this is the wrong time to do it. Find some balance in your life, improve your health and try again later.

If you ask about someone’s feelings, that person feels jealous. They lack self-confidence, so they tend to be possessive. That person would rather focus on what others have than on what to do to improve their own condition.

Intentions are natural in this case. Such people compare themselves to others. It could make them feel good at times, but it could also be an issue. They have many good things in life, but they choose to focus on what they don’t have instead.
You’re not seen very well, as someone is jealous of you. Insecurities make people think this way.
As for what you should do, it’s time to focus on yourself. Put yourself before others and make sure you get in good condition before helping out.
Numerological Meaning of Queen of Pentacles

The Queen of Pentacles is associated with the number 13. In many cultures, this is a sign of bad luck. In traditional numerology, this number is associated with death, but it’s not a bad thing. It depicts the death of a cycle and the beginning of something new.
From this point of view, it’s up to you to determine which way to go. If you’ve struggled lately, make some changes and the new cycle will be a flourishing one.
Astrological Meaning of Queen of Pentacles

The Queen of Pentacles is an element of Earth, but it’s highly influenced by water as well. It can be associated with more planets, such as Saturn, but its primary relation is with the feminine energy of Venus.

In this particular case, Venus refers to a love for security. Security could come in a relationship, but also in terms of money or finances. Getting there is a journey. On the other hand, the water association means you have a cleansing energy.
Zodiac Correspondence of the Queen of Pentacles
Generally associated with Virgo, Taurus or Capricorn, the Queen of Pentacles tends to float towards the Capricorn zodiac sign.
As a Capricorn, you like to provide and work hard. Take a look at the goat symbol on the card, too.
However, when associated with Taurus, you relate to abundance and stability. When identified with the Virgo zodiac sign, the card screams independence and the ability to provide for others.
Yes or No Meaning for the Queen of Pentacles
The upright position of the card shows abundance. You’re in a good place in life, so the card is a solid yes. You can achieve anything at this point.
But when reversed, it’s a solid no. Your mind is fogged. You have good intentions, but you’ll do more harm than good with your actions.
Key Actions

Try to look after every aspect in life when you see the Queen of Pentacles upright. Your home, family, love life, career, literally every aspect is almost in a perfect balance. However, you have to maintain it.

When reversed, the card asks you to pay more attention to yourself. You focus too much on those around you and you overlook yourself. Most issues tend to affect your well-being in the long run, so that should be your priority.

In the end, the Queen of Pentacles reminds you to find a balance. It’s important to take care of others but also to set boundaries and take care of yourself. Think about how you can balance these aspects in your life to stay happy and grow.
